characters: GIBBONS ON THE PRIVATE JET WITH A TEAM OF
A THIRD "X" BEING TATTOOED ON THE BACK OF XANDER'S HEAD.
GIBBONS IN THE ULTIMATE INFORMATION ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On a hill above the city is an old CATHEDRAL. The night i spooky, with harsh shadows playing across the cobblestone and medieval walls. A NERVOUS YOUNG HACKER makes his way down an alley. There is a DOOR at the end of the alley. MUSIC can be fai heard from inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: High above the street an INTRUDER DRESSED ALL IN BLACK sp from the roof. He's watching with NIGHT VISION GOGGLES. He pulls out a CROSSBOW and FIRES. A BOLT flies, trailing CABLE. THUNK! It sticks into the alley wall below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he passes by the ominous Cathedral, the Hacker spins,  sure he's heard something. But there's nothing there. He continues on. Then the Intruder comes sliding down the ZIP-LINE from ab WHAM! He kicks the Hacker into the wall, knocking him out The Intruder pulls off his mask, revealing the chiseled  features of a dashing BRITISH SECRET AGENT. His name is  STERLING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate to drop in unexpectedly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sterling searches the Hacker and pulls a SMALL BLACK CASE from his coat. Inside the case is a DATA CHIP. Sterling t it away. Sterling unzips his black jumpsuit, revealing a crisp TUX underneath. He pulls out CAR KEYS. In a quick insert we s the "ASTON-MARTIN" LOGO. As he strolls back out the alley, he HEARS something and  flattens against the wall. A BLACKED OUT SUV screeches to a stop, blocking his exit. The SUV's HEADLIGHTS illuminate the slumped Hacker. BAD GUYS get out to investigate, pulling out weapons. Cornered, Sterling heads deeper into the alley, staying i the shadows. He gets to that DOOR the Hacker was heading  towards. As he PICKS THE LOCK Sterling can hear MUSIC from inside. smooths his hair and prepares to "blend in" with the crow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sterling comes through the door and his face falls. He's  stepped into a loud METAL CONCERT. We see a GO-GO DANCER in LATEX. Onstage is RAMMSTEIN, a  bizarre German industrial-metal band. The tattooed YOUNG CROWD slam dances and swings glo-stix  over their heads. Some wear rubber BRAIN SKULLCAPS outfit with fiber optic lights. It's a sea of SPIKED HAIR and BO OUTFITS. Sterling squares his jaw and starts pushing through the c With his tuxedo he sticks out like a penguin in a chicken coop. ON THE BALCONY ABOVE THE CROWD stands a wild haired young GANGSTER with PIERCED BROWS. With him is a STREET-TOUGH G with multi-colored hair. They look like a post-Apocalypti Bonnie & Clyde. They are YORGI and PETRA. Yorgi checks his watch. His delivery is late. Then his CE PHONE rings. He's getting the news from outside. He looks down, spots Sterling amidst the moshing crowd. W that look, that tux, there's no mistaking what he is. They make EYE CONTACT and Sterling gives a little nod. Yorgi calmly issues orders into his phone. Immediately VIKTOR starts moving in Sterling's direction. Viktor is huge, with a MOHAWK and a six-inch GOATEE. Sterling sees him advancing and makes for the exit, pushi through the freaky crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sterling's ASTON-MARTIN VANTAGE screeches away from the c

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT
dialogues.text: Sterling is at the wheel of his spy car. He plugs the DAT CHIP into the dash and punches buttons. A computer screen says "DATA DOWNLOADING". He sees a BLACKED-OUT SUV racing up behind him. He accelerates and hits a SWITCH. ARMORED PLATING slides up over the rear window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SUV is right behind him. Viktor rolls down the passen window, readies his PISTOL. The rear bumper of the spy car opens. SMOKE BOMBS drop ou They explode in MASSIVE CLOUDS, obscuring the narrow, str Sterling skids around a corner. The blinded bad guys drive straight into a STOREFRONT. Gl and merchandise flies as the SUV gets stuck. The Aston-Martin rounds another corner and slides to a st Blocking the road ahead are two more SUV's. A MOTORCYCLE slides to a stop in front of them. The rider ANDERS, a leather clad biker who looks half Viking. Anders pulls out a SILENCED SUB-MACHINE GUN and starts  BLASTING. BULLETS SLAM into the Aston-Martin, cracking the bullet-p glass, shattering headlights, and BLOWING OUT THE FRONT T Sterling jams it into reverse and backs around the corner the RIMS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sterling notices an ERROR MESSAGE now flashing on his com screen: "TRANSMISSION ERROR: - DATA PARTIALLY SENT". Sterling looks around desperately. Somehow he's got to ge this data out of here. Straight ahead is the RIVER. Chugging up the river: a PAR BARGE. PARTYGOERS in formal attire dance to an orchestra. A SWIM POOL is in the middle of the deck for a perfect water lan

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time for a slow boat to China.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hits a BUTTON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rear license plate folds down, revealing a ROCKET ENG Flames spew as he jams down the accelerator. Sterling is pushed back into his seat by the G-forces. SPARKS fly from the rims as he skips across the pavement ever increasing speed. Anders FIRES with his gun, but Sterling is getting away! But then KIRILL steps around the corner. He's academic  looking, a CHAIN SMOKING intellectual with COKE-BOTTLE  GLASSES. He's also a highly proficient and cold-blooded  SNIPER. Kirill puts his lit cigarette behind his ear and unslings SURFACE-TO-AIR MISSILE LAUNCHER from his shoulder. The Aston-Martin reaches the riverbank and goes AIRBORNE. ROCKETS through the air towards the party barge. We see the car REFLECTED in Kirill's glasses as he AIMS. On a little SCREEN we see the missile launcher HOME IN on the HEAT SOURCE of the jet engine. The missile locks-in and FIRES... HEATSEEKER P.O.V. - we see a GREEN CAR with all its hot s GLOWING RED. Camera ROARS towards the flying car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sterling sees the missile streaking at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh bloody hell!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOMPH! The Aston-Martin EXPLODES in mid-air. Partygoers shriek as the AXLE and FLAMING RIMS rain down the deck. Kirill takes the cigarette from his ear, PUFFS IT. Finally, Sterling's flaming BOW TIE flutters down and lan on a LEAPING SALMON ICE-SCULPTURE above a tantalizing SEA BUFFET.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A STRAFING SHOT over the city. We make a sudden left turn and SPEED OUT OF TOWN. We shoot over to the BLUE RIDGE MOUNTAINS of VIRGINIA. In the middle of NOWHERE we dive towards a COMPLEX OF BLACK  BUILDINGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside it's modern, cold and high tech. An elevator COUNT DOWN to a deep basement level. The doors open and a TALL MAN man with a PROSTHETIC LEG  strides down the empty hall. AGENT GIBBONS is African- American, a battle-scarred WARRIOR. Even with a limp he l sturdy, confident, deadly. At the end of the hall is a METAL DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons walks into the INFORMATION ROOM of the NATIONAL  SECURITY AGENCY (NSA). There are WORLD MAPS, SATELLITE IM on COMPUTER SCREENS, TECHIES monitoring everything. If a nuclear war broke out, you could run the country fro down here. Gibbons takes an elevator up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The office is expensive yet devoid of personality, reflec the shadowy nature of it's owner. One wall is GLASS, look down on the information room. SAM TANNICK, grizzled NSA c looks down at the activity below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons enters, stands by the desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Evening, Sam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam remains in shadow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not a whole helluva lot. His final  transmission was mangled. About  something or someone called "Ahab".  Whatever it is, it cost him his life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was the best there was. That makes  three agents lost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're ruthless and they have a lot  of firepower. It's only a matter of  time before they figure out how to  deploy Silent Night. Then we're gonna  have a catastrophe on our hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silent Night in the hands of a bunch  of impertinent cowboys

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna have to step in, Sam.  Those CIA boys couldn't find a clown  in a field of cactus. Let me take  care of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How will you fix it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll go in with a team. But first  I'm going to need some intel. I'll  have to put someone inside, someone  new, someone they won't see coming.  One of their own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you'll dredge the bottom again.  You've done that before. The results  were... uneven.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanna find out about rats, ask a  rat. I've had my people put together  a talent pool. I downloaded it to  your desktop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons snaps on the giant FLATSCREEN on Sam's desk. He s cycling through PHOTO AFTER PHOTO of TOUGH LOOKING MEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The usual prospects. Convicts,  contract killers, murde...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scum of the Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But programmable. And expendable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've seen enough. Turn it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons clicks off the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're degenerates. There's not a  man in there that would give a damn  if the Chinese took over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's exactly why we need them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam sighs, stares out at the information room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get these "scum", Mr. Gibbons, bring  them in. Test them. Train them. Find  your man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The huge ARCO TOWER rises up towards a moonlit sky. We see ACCOMPLICE #1 (TRAVIS PASTRANA) sneak up and take  position behind a FOUNTAIN. ACCOMPLICE #2 (CAREY HART) sneaks across a roof and takes position overlooking the fountain position of #1. ACCOMPLICE #3 (DAVE MIRRA) takes up position in the secon story window of a FLOPHOUSE HOTEL down the street. A MESSENGER (BOB BURNQUIST) skates up to the front of the skyscraper with a PACKAGE. He gets the attention of the  SECURITY GUARD inside. The Security Guard unlocks the doo and lets him in. Just then a VAN pulls up and ACCOMPLICES #4 (SHAUN PALMER and #5 (MAT HOFFMAN) hop out. They open up the back and a BICYCLE is rolled out of the back by a MAN IN A HOODED JA Jacket Man rolls the bike to the skyscraper and enters th lobby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Security Guard is checking his computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crump... I'm sorry, no one by that  name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: K The Guard glances up as Jacket Man gets into an ELEVATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! You can't go up there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Security Guard rushes to intercept him. The Messenger kicks his skateboard out, TRIPPING UP the Security Guard. The Messenger hauls ass out the door. The Security Guard  pulls out his WALKIE-TALKIE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got an intruder in the express  elevator!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The button for "91 - ROOF ACCESS" is lit up. Jacket Man w patiently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This fancy office is empty for the night. The STAIRWELL D opens and a PLATOON of SECURITY GUARDS rushes in. They ta Up position in front of the elevator doors armed with BIL CLUBS and TASERS. DING! The elevator arrives and the door swings open. But  there's NOBODY INSIDE. One Guard steps forward and suddenly a bicycle SWINGS DOW from the ceiling, TAGGING HIM IN THE FACE. He falls back, TASERING another Guard. Jacket Man drops down onto his bike and pedals through th chaos before the Guards know what hit them. There's a CUR PIECE OF ART in the room, some kind of modern art statue. Jacket Man rides up the artwork like a ramp and does a  TABLETOP AERIAL over a DIVIDER. He hits the ground pedall the Guards hot after him. Jacket Man enters a HUGE OPEN ROOM with a FIELD OF CUBICL in the middle. He bunny hops onto a desk and SLIDES TO A  STOP. He tosses back his hood and we get a good look at h for the first time. He is XANDER CAGE. He's got a shaved head, bizarre TATTOO all over his body and multiple PIERCINGS. He's lean and  heavily cut, even dangerous looking. The Guards charge at him and he HOPS up onto the top of t CUBICLE WALL. This thing is maybe FOUR INCHES WIDE and FI FEET TALL. He pedals across the top of the cubicle wall, the Guards  scrambling after him. Xander bunny hops over one guy's head onto the next set o cubicles and pedals hard. The Guards fall all over themse trying to catch him. At the other end Xander catches air and lands on a CONFER TABLE. He does a WHEELIE across it's length with Guards  closing in. Xander springs up and does a TAIL WHIP, knocking them bac with his rear wheel. He lands and pedals to the stairwell untouched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander bursts out of the stairwell to the top of the TALL BUILDING IN DOWNTOWN LA. He climbs on a RAISED PLATFORM. From here he can drop down onto another level that is str with SATELLITE DISHES and MICROWAVE RELAYS. Guards rush onto the roof and try to corral him. Xander tears off his jacket, revealing a BACKPACK on his  back and VIDEO CAMERA on his chest. He pulls out a ROAD F and SPARKS IT. We see there are SOAKED RAGS tied to his  SPOKES. He LIGHTS THEM with the flare. Then he TOSSES THE FLARE o the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Accomplices see the flare drop. #'s 1, 2 & 3 pull OUT and start filming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander races around the roof like a trapped animal. He ev Security Guards, picking up speed. With Guards right behind, he drops off the TOP PLATFORM a lands on a massive SATELLITE DISH. Using the dish as a ramp, Xander LAUNCHES himself OFF THE TOP OF THE BUILDING. We're talking 90 some stories here. He spins through the air, his bike on fire. He's doing en over end backflips. One... Two... Three... Four... He's looping through space on his bike, a crazy man on a  flaming bike against a backdrop of sleek skyscrapers and  night lights. The stunt is covered by the various Accomplices and Xande own chest camera, in SUPER 8 and DIGITAL VIDEO, from four different angles. Xander ditches the bike, kicking it away from him and plu towards the ground. At the last moment he throws out a "bucket" and his PARAC OPENS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bicycle comes flying down and SMASHES into the paveme It bounces a full TWO STORIES back up before coming to re Xander glides down and makes his landing. Accomplices #4 #5 rush out to help him gather up his chute and jump in t van. SIRENS APPROACH as the van makes it's escape. As COP CARS screech up to the skyscraper, one of them RUN OVER the smoking wreckage of the bike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TITLE SEQUENCE - HARDCORE MUSIC plays as we see a flowing TAPESTRY OF FLORID TATTOOS. SILHOUETTED against this back we see the OUTLINES of NUDE WOMEN riding BMX BIKES in a H PIPE, BLADING ever obstacles, SKY SURFING and doing stree SKATE TRICKS. It's a collision of outlandish imagery that tells you one thing: This ain't your daddy's spy movie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander, now on a MOTORCYCLE, zips through traffic. He's  smiling, leaning it way over on the turns. He's got anoth BACKPACK on his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander drives his motorcycle into the garage of his build

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FREIGHT ELEVATOR rises up, bringing Xander and his  motorcycle into the loft. There are EXTREME SPORTS ACTION POSTERS on the walls,  MOTORCYCLE PARTS and BARBELLS on the floor, and everywher there's EXTREME SPORTS EQUIPMENT of every description.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sky, you there? Start packin' cause  we are out of here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a NEATLY FOLDED FLAG hanging in a slightly crooke FRAME on the wall. Xander straightens it as he goes by. He hears her in the sectioned off "bedroom" and heads bac there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did I promise you a fat vacation or  what? Get ready to get down in  paradise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He comes into the bedroom to find SKY, his long-suffering girlfriend. She's a wannabe artist type. She's got SUITCA and BOXES scattered around and she's PACKING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you don't need all this just to  go on vacation. Unless this ain't  for going on vacation...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm through, Xander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can see that. Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You run around with maniacs jumping  motorcycles in the desert, you break  36 bones crashing wave runners and  snowboarding off cliffs, all with no  health insurance... It's insane, I  can't take it anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm having fun, what's the problem?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have all this talent, and you  waste it. You won't take a single  endorsement deal. Meanwhile those  other guys have their own video games!  But no, you've got too much  "integrity" for that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't wanna go mersh, you know  that. But hey, if this is about  money...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He opens up the backpack, revealing WADS OF CASH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got an advance on the next bootleg.  Let's get out of here, just you and  me. We'll chill out in Bora Bora for  a couple months.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sorts through the money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: French Polynesia? This wouldn't last  us a week in a cheap hotel. Do you  know how expensive it is down there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, so I'll get more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not about the money, X! You  never plan for anything. I can't  live like that anymore, I need some  stability.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well if you're bailing, I guess I'd  better give you your surprise now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls off his shirt. Pierced through his nipple is a  DIAMOND ENGAGEMENT RING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was gonna wait till the islands,  but...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're serious?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course I'm serious. I bought it,  didn't I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shakes her head) This is so typical. I can't believe  you. I've barely seen you for the  last three weeks and now this? Are  you out of your mind?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. I thought this is what  you wanted. You want stability, here  it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't just propose to me out of  nowhere. You think that's going to  solve our problems? I'm sorry, X. It  was a kick for a while, but it's  over. You're just not going anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not exactly "going anywhere"  yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're wrong about that. I'm heading  out that door right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She heads towards the front door. Just then the door BLOWS IN. CRASH! -- the windows SMASH IN too. Then the LIGHTS GO OU as STORMTROOPERS in black body armor rush in, weapons dra It's a blur of FLASHLIGHTS, PISTOLS and JACK BOOTS. It's  scary as hell. A professional take-down. They slam Xander against the wall. Just like that it's quiet again. Sky hyperventilates, a g in her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She had nothing to do with the tower  jump. She's nobody. I just met her  last night. Tell them. (with meaning) I hardly know you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Stormtrooper looks at Sky. She nods. The Stormtrooper take their guns off her. Sky grabs up here stuff. She looks back at Xander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep the ring. It looks better on  you anyways.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She heads out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God, I hate cops. What's the charges  this time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Stormtrooper pulls out a DART GUN and SHOOTS Xander. pulls a CHROME DART from his chest, examines it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (groggy) You... pussies...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander slides to the floor. FADE TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SIDEWAYS IMAGE: an out of focus COFFEE CREAMER. Xander wakes up with his head on the counter of a DINER. shakes out the cobwebs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHIP PAN as a WAITRESS walks by. Xander blinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. Where am I? How did I get here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, you wandered in ten  minutes ago and put your head down.  I told you we were closing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander looks around, sees a TRUCKER chewing with his mout open. A SALESMAN buried in his NEWSPAPER. Xander gets up. Where the hell is he? He takes a step tow the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Want some coffee?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Waitress pours him coffee. QUICK PUSH TO: her hands a shaking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) Fine, just fine. Come on and sit.  I'll get you something to eat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander sits. When he swigs his coffee, he notices somethi written on his napkin in shaky ballpoint: "S.O.S." What the hell? He looks at the Trucker. The Trucker's sta at the waitress. QUICK PUSH TO: The Trucker has a BULGE  underneath his vest... then PUSH TO: The Salesman's eyes  darting about suspiciously, newspaper pulled up to his no Something is going down... He hears a SLOWED DOWN VOICE and glances back at the Truc who's now fixing him with a DEATH STARE. Xander snaps fro his reverie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said, you got a problem, boy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Problem? No, no problem. You go right  ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With what? I said, go right on ahead  with what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever, dude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Trucker and the Salesman look at each other. Suddenly they jump up. The Trucker pulls a PISTOL from his vest, the Salesman  brandishes the SHOTGUN he had behind the paper. The Waitr cringes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, nobody make a move! (to Xander) Shoulda walked away when you had the  chance, dumb shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget him, Buck, let's just do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up! (in Xander's face) You keep still or I'm gonna make  damn sure you stop breathing today.  Got that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander stays strangely calm, his senses now fully focused

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shrugs) Alright, "Buck", whatever you say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Waitress let's out a whimper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep your gotdam mouth shut and empty  that register! Couldn't just let him  leave, could ya! You know what I'm  gonna do to ya for that? Huh? Do  ya?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes to open the register and knocks a tray of glasse on the floor. Xander springs into action. He CHOPS down on the Trucker's arm and ELBOWS him in the  face. Xander twists the gun out of his hand and kicks his legs from under him. The Salesman pumps on his shotgun, but it seems to be jam

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better shoot me quick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Salesman fights with his gun but can't get it to work Xander advances on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too late!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He unleashes with a series of rapid front kicks to the ja The Salesman goes crashing through the kitchen doors. Xander turns to the terrified Waitress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, bitch, what's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stares at him, unable to speak. He raises the gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Talk! What's the game? Who are you  people?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front door bell JINGLES. A guy with an impeccably tai suit and a cane hobbles in. It's Gibbons. There a problem Mr. Cage?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who the hell are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The name's Gibbons. You were saying?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this place?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like a diner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Diner, huh? Let me tell you what the  problem is. I wake up drugged to  find what? You've got a "salesman"  over here reading a three week old  newspaper. He's pulling a 211 with a  "trucker", who happens to be packing  a cop issue H&K 9mm. I get tipped  that something is going down when  she passes me a note. How's that for  twisted logic? How did she know there  was trouble unless they pulled the  guns before I "walked" in? And if  that's true, why'd they stop and  wait until I woke up to gaffle the  money? Then I notice how beefy they  both are. Hell, even the waitress is  cut. All three of them look like  they went through the same training  program. Ergo they ain't strangers  and this isn't what it seems. That's  how I knew yo-yo wouldn't get a round  off even if I gave him all day. Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He aims at the Waitress and FIRES! She's startled, but un

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuz there's nothing but blanks in  these guns. And no offense, but their  performances were terrible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander tosses the gun on the counter. Gibbons gives a sly smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not bad. Not bad at all. Have a seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons sits in a booth. Xander sits across from him. In background the Waitress helps the Trucker and Salesman up

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Most guys we ran through this either  took off or helped them rob the place.  I expected you to do the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That shows me already that you don't  have a clue. What's it to you, anyway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whether you thought this was for  real or not, you jumped in and helped  the waitress on instinct. That tells  me something about your character.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good for you. Now why don't you stop  wasting my time and tell me what you  want. You didn't go through all this  for my benefit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's your lucky day. You just might  get the chance to pay back our  wonderful country for all the freedom  you enjoy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Fed, I shoulda known. Who else  would have this kind of budget? Now  you're gonna hit me with the sales  pitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, Cage, you've got me. This  is one of those moments. "Many are  called, few are chosen", that kind  of thing. Your government needs you.  Are you up for the challenge?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..If you're trolling around for narcs,  man, have you got the wrong guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at me, dude, do I look like a  fan of law enforcement? Forget the  tests, you shoulda just asked me. I  woulda saved you a lot of trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh I don't know, I think the tests  work pretty well. Sometimes they  give me answers you wouldn't admit  to in a million years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we done now? You've got nothing  on me. So if you ain't booking me,  I'm walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got this wrong. You're not  under arrest, you've been abducted.  And until I say different, you belong  to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that a fact?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure as gravity. I've had a feeling  about you from the start, Cage. It's  nausea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) You know what I hate? Any scumbag  with a clean shirt and a bad haircut  can get one of those tin stars and  suddenly they think they're God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) You know what I hate? It's always  the assholes that pass the tests.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a POP and Xander clutches his stomach. Gibbons to his DART GUN onto the table. Xander blinks at him. He pulls another CHROME DART from his gut and examines it

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You bastards love to see me sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHACK! He goes face down on the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He comes to, blinking in low RED LIGHT. He's shocked to f that he's...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander's on the floor of a military aircraft. TWO OTHER T GUYS are waking up next to him. One's a greaser named VIR the other is T.J., ex-Navy. Xander notices as they each pull out CHROME DARTS. They s up, looking at each other. Xander chuckles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's so damn funny?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Been to any good diners lately?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three laugh, realizing they're all in the same boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We must be the final "candidates".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They quiet down as they notice for the first time, THEY A NOT ALONE. Sitting silently on benches facing them are SOLDIERS DRES IN BLACK. They wear BLACK MASKS over their faces. They ar nasty looking BLACK OPS TEAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody told me this was a costume  party.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Ops Team, just stares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've worked with guys like this  before. Black Ops. Serious government  spooks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Virg notices something STRAPPED TO HIS BODY. They all hav them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heads up, man. What's this thing on  my back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A parachute. This does not argue  well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then the red light switches to GREEN. One of the Soldiers opens the JUMP DOOR. The rest of the  team advances on Xander, Virg and T.J.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is bullshit! Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They drag Virg to the door and THROW HIM OUT. T.J. goes n kicking and fighting. Then they turn on Xander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I get the picture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander jumps out on his own. We see him tumbling away from the airplane. Far below his chute BLOSSOMS OPEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see three chutes coming down. The first two HIT HARD. We ROCKET IN on the last chute as Xander lands like a pro The other guys run up to him. Then they hear SHOUTING in  SPANISH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jee-zus, man! What the hell now?  Another damn test?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should head for those trees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't look at me, brother. It's every  man for himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They wrestle out of their chutes and push past each other they TAKE OFF IN DIFFERENT DIRECTIONS. Xander runs low down a culvert. There's SHOUTING all arou He flattens down and crawls up over the rise. What he see stuns him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gotta be kidding me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We crane up to reveal A FIELD OF POT PLANTS. There's a CO PROCESSING PLANT along the field's edge. The whole place  looks exactly like a Central American DRUG FARM. NARCO TERRORISTS run around with AK-47's. Xander sneaks past EQUIPMENT covered in CAMOUFLAGE NETTIN A squad of Narcos runs by and Xander makes his move. He rounds another pile of equipment and comes right into HEADLIGHTS of a truck. Narcos hop out and charge forward. Xander raises his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You boys are too good for me. Guess  I failed this one, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They grab him and haul him away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see a RUSTY MEAT HOOK. A CHAIN is wrapped around it. Attached to the chain, his arms over his head, is Xander. He's in the middle of a bleak looking room. There are  BLOODSTAINS on the wooden walls, the floor strewn with fi HAY. Behind him against the wall Xander sees T.J. and Virg bot HOG-TIED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So much for "every man for himself".  Nice to see you again, fellas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They really went all out on this  one. This is a pretty gnarly setup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check the table in the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a BLOOD STAINED TOWEL COVERING a TABLE near the d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This oughta be good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then they hear talking outside and the door is UNLOCKED. A very nasty looking Marco comes in. By his look he's the LEADER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This must be el jefe. How's it goin'  jefe? Some weather we're havin'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Narco Guards bring in one of their PARACHUTES and toss it the floor. They exit, closing the door behind them. Jefe goes to the table throws back the towel. Beneath it HIDEOUS, BLOOD ENCRUSTED TORTURE DEVICES: a HACK SAW, a B CUTTERS, KNIVES, CHISELS, a BLOW TORCH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's on the menu tonight? The old  blowtorch-to-the-family jewels  routine, I'll bet. Hey, you want  roasted nuts, let's break out the  Planters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T.J. and Virg both crack up. Jefe gives them a withering  look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know what we do with people  come round here? You know what we do  with people come in our business?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jefe passes his hand over the various tools. He finally  settles on a crude MACHETE. He walks amongst them brandis it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We cut the Achilles tendon. Your  feet flop around like a marionette.  You ain't walkin' nowhere no more. Sound good, tough guy? Or maybe  instead you wanna tell me something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stops in front of Xander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatchu doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I don't know. It was an accident.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's some accident, hombre. You  accidentally fall out of a plane in  the middle of the night and land up  in my back yard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He BACKHANDS Xander across the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We seen this kind of parachutes  before, you know. U.S. Army. You got  some friends here, jump out with you  guys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're anti-social. We don't have any  friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jefe SLAPS him again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No friends, huh? That's funny, I  don't know no U.S. Army that comes  without no friends. That's cuz U.S.  Army is pussies. They always come  with the five hundred guys and the  helicopters and the see-in-the-dark  glasses. So don't you tell me you  all alone out here, my friend. You  bullshitting the wrong guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander looks over at T.J. and Virg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's writing this dude's dialogue?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a pretty good actor, though.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Makes the diner look like a sixth  grade play. He's even got them crazy  eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ain't begun to see crazy yet,  amigo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're on to the game, ese. You got  the fake blood splattered all over  the walls, you got your torture  tools... It's all very cute. But  come on, let's quit while you're  ahead. I'm only trying to save you a  beatin'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You saving me? You talking pretty  tough for a guy got himself chained  to the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shrugs) Alright. You wanna eat through a  tube, be my guest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you're gonna make me enjoy this,  funny guy. Now I'm gonna take the  whole foot off. Whatchu think of  that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A low THUMPING is heard outside. It's the sound of approa HELICOPTERS, lots of them. Then the night ERUPTS in GUNFIRE. It sounds like a full s assault outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that, eh? I thought you didn't  have no friends!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jefe goes into a fury. He SWINGS his machete at Xander's  legs. Xander JUMPS UP, grabbing on to the chain above, and KICK Jefe in the chest. Jefe falls back and Xander climbs up to the roof BEAM. He grabs onto the beam with his legs and UNHOOKS his chai from the meat hook. He drops down, six feet of chain still hanging from his c wrists, and Jefe comes charging at him. Xander dodges a few wild swings. He grabs Jefe's PANT CUFF and dumps him on his ass. Jefe scrambles to his feet, drawing his PISTOL. Xander swings his chain and WHIPS the gun out of Jefe's h With another swing he WRAPS the chain around Jefe's neck pulls it taught.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keys. You got 'em?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jefe nods, choking, and reaches into his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hand 'em to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instead Jefe hurls them out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you're getting paid extra for  this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander jerks the chain, slamming Jefe head first into the wall. Jefe drops, knocked out. Outside it sounds like a full scale FIREFIGHT. Xander get the machete and CUTS the ropes holding T.J. and Virg. Then a HAIL OF BULLETS sprays through the room. All three guys hit the deck but T.J. gets shot. He clutch his side, BLOOD all over his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm hit! I'm hit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're shooting for real! This is  all real.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander knows this is true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He checks out T.J.'s wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help me with this guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's like you said, every man for  himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Virg bolts for the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That only works if you're a man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Narcos are shouting, running to and fro. TRACER ROUNDS cut through the air. They are trying to rep an UNSEEN ASSAULT FORCE. Overhead SIX MILITARY HELICOPTERS buzz the compound like  Apocalypse Now, their NIGHT SUNS lighting up the place. Xander comes out of the torture building holding T.J. in fireman's carry. His hands are still CUFFED, the length o chain dragging. Xander crouches behind some equipment, putting T.J. on th ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I used to be a SEAL, it's not the  first time I've been shot. Thanks,  man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep your head down, I'll be right  back. I'm gonna steal us some wheels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander moves on, finds cover under the camouflage netting He can see Narcos shooting into the trees at the UNSEEN E Looking the other way, he spots Virg running back his way He's been corralled by one of the Helicopters. He's zigzagging, trying to stay out of the beam of it's N Sun. Xander darts out and GRABS him, pulling him under the  camouflage netting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're all over the place! What the  hell's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like we're in the middle of  the drug war.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Helicopter lights up the camouflage netting. They're pinned down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright Mr. free-for-all, you go  that way, I'm gonna go this way.  They can't follow us both.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They squat down in runners stances, the helicopter kickin up DUST all around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They jet off in opposite directions. Xander books, running for all he's worth. His cuffed hand and the dangling chain make it difficult. He's heading straight into the FIELD OF POT PLANTS. Suddenly the massive SPOTLIGHT picks him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CHOPPER swoops down after him. Its big GATLING GUNS turn, aiming right at him. BRAAAAAAAAPPP! The guns cut loose, tearing up the ground  right behind him. Xander sprints, the chopper after him like Cary Grant in  "North By Northwest", except instead of corn fields, Xand running through a field of HUGE MARIJUANA PLANTS. Xander hits the deck and the chopper soars over him. Xander cuts over a couple rows and hunkers down amongst t plants. All around him it's a chaos of Helicopters and GUNFIRE. Two choppers attack the factory building, BLASTING it wit their guns. Narcos run terrified. Xander notices a FAT PURPLE BUD on the plant right in fro of him. He SNAPS IT OFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna need to hit the trees after  a night like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tucks it-into his shirt and takes off through the POT  FOREST. Xander finally spots a vehicle. It's a TRUCK LADEN WITH B OF COCAINE. He heads for it. Then the SPOTLIGHT finds him again and the Chopper swings around. The gatling guns RIP the plants to pieces all aro him. Xander hauls ass, heading for the truck. Bullets chew up the dirt all around him. As the helicopter passes overhead, it's guns RAKE THE TRU There is a FLASH as the GAS TANK goes up. WHOOOOPPHH! A SUPERNOVA OF FIRE AND HIGH-GRADE COKE erupt into the night air. Xander dives into a DRAINAGE DITCH. He tumbles down into  FILTHY WATER. A powdery cloud washes over him, dusting the trees white. Near him is a big DRAINPIPE leeching sewage. Xander crawl inside. The Chopper makes another pass overhead. The big spotlight plays over the area, then moves on. Xander gives a sigh of relief. He crawls out of the drain JEEPS race by on the road right above him as MILITARY MEN flood the compound. There's no going back. Xander turns and makes his way along the tree line. The chopper and gunfire are in the distance now. Things a quieter here and he starts to relax. Bad idea. As he goes by, one of the TREES moves. He takes a few more steps and the grass he just walked on EXPLODES UPWARDS. ARMS reach out, tackling Xander from be Another TEAM of BLACK OPS SOLDIERS bursts from the weeds, the bushes, all perfectly camouflaged like the landscape. They fall on him like a curtain. XANDER'S P.O.V. - Soldiers hold him down while a BLACK HO is pulled over his head. FADE TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the MASSIVE HANGER DOORS CLOSE we can see CHOPPERS tak off and landing. MEXICAN SOLDIERS load Jefe and his Narco onto a FEDERALE BUS. Virg resists and is BEATEN. T.J. can seen being loaded into an AMBULANCE. The hanger doors slide shut with a THUD. We see Xander's HANDS as the CHAINS are cut away. Xander sits in a chair with the BLACK HOOD still over his head. He blinks when the hood is torn off. A Black Ops So smirks as he walks away. Xander looks around, sees the Black Ops Team unpacking so STRANGE GEAR. Two of them are dumping bottles of a CLEAR  LIQUID into a RUSTY CLAWFOOT BATHTUB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice of you to draw me a bath. Is it  Saturday already?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Ops guys grin knowingly. On the other side, Xander sees a FLIGHT CREW readying a  GULFSTREAM for travel. Gibbons steps up from behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Congratulations, you've just graduated  at the head of your class.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a cold piece of work. You  almost got three people killed out  there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good thing you were there to save  the day. Come walk with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander gets up and Gibbons leads him on a stroll around t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've really got me confused, Cage.  On the one hand you showed leadership,  courage under fire, a willingness to  protect men you hardly knew... and  on the other you have an arrest record  that pegs you as near sociopathic.  Help me out here. I'm not following  your evolution.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want the cheap backstory? The  runaway mom, the suicide dad and the  foster homes? Gimme a break. You're  not interested in my past, you're  interested in my future as some kind  of spy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're perceptive too. I forgot to  add that to the list of surprises.  I'm with the National Security Agency.  And unlikely as it may sound, I need  your help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not interested. I've already got  a job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're an adrenaline junkie with one  foot in the penitentiary. You risk  your ass building a daredevil myth  that means nothing and you're not  getting any younger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I plan on getting a lot older. And  playing spy games sounds like a quick  way to get yourself dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's too bad. I thought a guy like  you would appreciate the challenge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they walk by the Black Ops guys, Xander sees they're  getting busy. One spreads out a plastic DROPCLOTH. Anothe plugs in a BONE SAW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this? You're gonna try to  scare me now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons grabs a CHICKEN LEG from a guy eating lunch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know the reason why I try to  recruit guys like you? There's no  risk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tosses it into the tub. Instantly it starts to SIZZLE BUBBLE. The tub is full of ACID.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's nobody back home who's gonna  ask questions if you just... disappear  for a while.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In seconds the entire leg has been consumed, leaving only oily cloud of residue. Gibbons eyes him coldly, nailing the point home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I'm the one who's nauseous. So  what's the deal? What do you need me  for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's some folks I want to keep  tabs on. Dirty, tattooed, uncivilized.  Your kind of people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do I get out of it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you find out what I want to know,  and if I'm able to successfully use  that information, you get to go back  to your degenerate little life. If  not, you take a bath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're one sick bastard. A sadist  with a badge looking to rope me in  to a suicide mission. I think no  matter which way I go I'm likely to  wind up face down on a sheet of  plastic. So here's my answer: kiss  my ass, Hop-along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons kicks the back of Xander's leg and dumps him on h ass. Gibbons was so quick, Xander never saw it coming. The Black Ops guys clap and cheer, always interested in a fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not bad for a gimp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's with that "X" on the back of  your head? Does that mean you're  "extreme"? I've got some news for  you, Mr. X, you're a three time loser.  So maybe you should tattoo another  couple of X's on your head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take that under advisement.  Maybe I can be like you and lose a  leg for the old Stars and Bars. I  bet the flag's a great comfort every  time you need help climbing stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons lunges and grabs Xander's throat in the vice-like grip of his thumb and middle finger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One twitch and my finger and thumb  will meet inside your esophagus.  Believe me, Mr. X, I've put foot to  ass for my country on many occasions  and I don't feel the urge to stop  just yet. So think carefully before  you tell me: Is "kiss my ass, Hop- along" your final answer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fingers are so powerful that Xander is paralysed. He  looks over, sees the bone saw start revving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (choking) No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons releases his grip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you might see it my way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then Xander starts walking away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where you going, X? I said where you  going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Ops guys grab weapons, ready to stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You tell me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander climbs up the steps of the Gulfstream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There better be a movie on this Goddam  flight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander sits with Gibbons in big leather chairs. They are  surrounded by NSA AGENTS in suits. A NERDY AGENT snaps an ANKLET around Xander's ankle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about a pedicure as long as you're  down there. What's this? Lo-Jack?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wherever you go on the planet, I'll  find you. There's no quitting. If  you try to take it off, a ring of  needles will inject enough curare  into your bloodstream to kill you  before you hit the ground. Is all  that clear?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I spy or I die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Orange light floods this beautiful airline lounge. There' fully stocked bar, a snack table, all unused. That's beca it's been sealed off for NSA use. (NOTE: perfect product  placement opportunity for an AIRLINE). Xander, Gibbons and his Men are all silhouetted against t smoked glass windows. The Nerdy Agent hands Xander a Palm Pilot sized ELECTRONI DEVICE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your communicator. You'll  identify yourself by a call sign.  From here on out you're Bulldog Omega  5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must stay up late to come up  with shit like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I expect you to call in regularly  with progress reports.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine, but I'm not gonna be no Bulldog  Omega 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons checks his watch. They get up and start walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phalanx of Agents surrounds Xander and Gibbons as the walk to the gate. The Nerdy Agent hurries to catch up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... Call signs derive from the  parameters of the mission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he doesn't like it, we can make  an exception just this once. We'll  call him "Triple X".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk past the gate, down the jet-way, the Agents FLA BADGES to the GATE WORKERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crude and defiant as always, Triple  X. It fits so well because you're  obscene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander is the last one to board the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that all?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just remember, I'll be watching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the door closes, he looks back at Gibbons and his phal of Agents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got something for you to chew  on. Next time you send someone to  save the world, make sure they like  the planet the way it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The jet's door CLOSES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander is in the last row against the bulkhead. He's got personal DVD player and headphones and he's reviewing his mission. The high-tech screen shows photos, maps, cool  graphics. The KID sitting across the aisle leans over for a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What game is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slick graphics, huh? See these dudes?  They're called "Anarchy 99", they're  the bad guy bosses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do they have any special powers? The  bosses always have special powers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanna check it out? Come here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kid moves to the seat next to Xander. Onscreen see photos of the FIVE BAD GUYS from the opening sequence. We DIVE IN to the computer as Xander describes  them. For each of the baddies, we'll see 3-D PHOTOS and VIDEO C all enhanced with COMPUTER GRAPHICS and POP-UP MENUS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First we've got Anders, the psycho  looking biker. In charge of  transportation and smuggling. Controls  every trucking union in Eastern  Europe. Don't look too clean, either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see ANDERS, the wild-eyed and unclean Swedish biker,  against a backdrop of MOTORCYCLES and MUSCLE CARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next we got a Siberian redneck,  Viktor. Into snowmobiles and  snowboarding. So naturally, he covers  prostitution and the drug trade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Naturally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Viktor, with the goatee and belly, doing some hair snowboarding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This guy's kinda dorky lookin'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill, the sniper. Looks like a  bookworm, but he had 72 confirmed  kills in Chechnya, they called him  the "Finger of God". Assassination  and weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Kirill in UNIFORM with his well used SNIPER RIFLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's the hottie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He indicates Petra, the tough gangster chick. With her LE and TATTOOS she looks like she could mop up the floor wit Lara Croft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You like her, huh? Petra. She runs  their finances, money laundering,  computers. Joined the gang after  spending some time as the girlfriend  of this dude, Yorgi Azar Zimin. Capo  of Anarchy 99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally we see YORGI, the unlikely looking Mafiya Don. We see CRIME SCENE PHOTOS that illustrate his exploits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi masterminded the take-over of  three Red Mafiya clans. Cops called  it "blood week". He combined all of  their global enterprises into one  huge crime syndicate: Anarchy 99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (skeptically) "Anarchy" 99"?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you gonna do? They're Euro- trash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What weapons do you have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander clicks on "INVENTORY". He scrolls through a stagge array of WEAPONS and VEHICLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just about anything I want, it looks  like. This is gonna be tough, though.  There's no way to save this game. I  gotta get it right the first time  through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you get if you finish?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing, really. My guy is just doing  it to stay alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. I bet by the end he gets something  out of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets to be the hero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Kid's mom calls him back to his seat. Xander looks at the kid, then gets back to his research.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We CRANE UP from the COBBLESTONE STREET as a BEAT-UP CAR  races by. We rise up, revealing PRAGUE in all it's glory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander sits in the back, wedged between TWO IDENTICAL LOO TOUGH GUYS. If you were to call Central Casting and ask f a couple of cold war spy types, this is what they'd send. They're both 6' 4", have sloppily cut hair, square jaws,  wrinkled overcoats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is bullshit, man, I wanna see  some ID.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two tough guys flash their COP ID's. Xander studies t "IVAN PEDGRAG" and "IVAN PODROV".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're both named Ivan? That's gotta  be confusing on Valentine's Day. So  where we headed? Fellas, I said where  we headed? (beat) Yeah, whatever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks out the window, sees a GRAND HOTEL. They drive r on by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a crumbling old dump in a nasty part of town. Xander shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James Bond never had to put up with  this shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ivan 1 pulls Xander's gear bag from the trunk and throws on the sidewalk. Xander picks it up and carries it into the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dumpy furniture, roaches, cracked windows. Xander is ushe in. There's another GUY in a UGLY SUIT waiting. He is  DETECTIVE MILAN SLOVO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been on a plane for twelve hours,  I think I'll stand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ivan 1 shoves him into a chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My name is Slovo, Czech secret police.  When you are here you are under my  jurisdiction, you take my orders,  you do what I say. If you become any  kind of an inconvenience, I'll shoot  you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we go again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're here because your government  is putting pressure on my government.  This is an internal affair, a Czech  affair, that you are interfering  with. I will warn you once: Don't  shit in my lawn. Get whatever  information your government seeks  and get our.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First of all, you should kill whoever  sold you that suit. Two, I don't  wanna be here either, so just step  off. Three, if you had the authority  to shoot me you would've done it by  now, so just ease up on the machismo,  bitch. Now that we've got that sorted  out, I'm gonna get some rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander lays down on the bed. Slovo stares, burning with  hatred. He heads to the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be ready in three hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slovo exits. Ivans 1 & 2 stay, staring at Xander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A fancy, flashy disco with an extreme sports theme. A big bouncer in a leather coat works the door. This is a highc expensive joint but it still looks seedy and dangerous. Xander and Slovo walk up to the place. Xander's wearing a Tshirt that says "RON JEREMY: AMERICAN LEGEND" complete w a photo of the Hedgehog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A STRIPPER that looks like a runway model SLIDES across t stage on SKATEBOARD KNEE-PADS while PATRONS cheer. The di is a combination STRIP-CLUB and CONCERT VENUE. All the  STRIPPERS are outfitted in HELMETS, ELBOW PADS, G-STRINGS and BELLY SHIRTS. There's a WARPED TOUR BAND playing on a STAGE. On either  side of the stage are two MINI-HALF PIPES that the GIRLS cutting back and forth on. WEALTHY BUSINESSMEN sit in plush booths getting table dan while the dance floor is packed with sexily dressed YOUNG HIPSTERS. Xander gets a beer from a BUXOM COCKTAIL WAITRESS on IN-L SKATES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice hops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The corner. Anarchy 99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slovo points them out in the far corner. They're surround by straight faced BODYGUARDS. What ANARCHY 99 is doing in their booth with the STRIPPER looks like Led Zeppelin on tour. Booze, broads, good time These guys are living like rock stars. They're all here: Anders the biker, Viktor, Kirill. In th middle sit Yorgi and Petra. Petra's wearing an "I AM EVIL Tshirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See the one with the funny colored  hair? Crazy bitch stabbed one of my  men in the knee-cap. There they are,  American. The low-rent millionaire  criminals. And you thought only your  country had white trash. American?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks around but Xander is gone. He heads for the exit pushing his way through the crowd. But then he spots him, not by the door but deeper in the club.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees Xander walk right up to the Anarchy 99 booth and  start talking to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slovo can't hear a thing, but they're obviously intereste in what he has to say. Next thing he knows Xander is poin at him and waving him over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (horrified) What the hell...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slovo makes his way through the crowd to the booth. Yorgi looks him up and down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This pizda? Never seen him before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Slovo) Who you workin' for? What do you do  for a living, dickhead?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... I am... I work in insurance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander grabs Slovo and starts searching him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (panicked whisper) What the hell are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slams Slovo up against the wall and pulls out Slovo's  police badge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look what we have here. Czech 5-0 on  the mack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bodyguards pull out guns and Slovo rushes for the  emergency exit in a panic. In seconds he's out and gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cops. Like a plague. No matter how  many you pay there's always another  with his hand out. How did you pick  him out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He flashed his badge to half the bar  when he bought his drink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I appreciate you bringing this to  our attention. Whatever you want,  the rest of the night, consider it  on the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi waves over some strippers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, but I'm here on business. I  heard you're the G around here. I'm  looking for some cars, expensive  ones. A lot of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, man, don't know what you're  talking about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm talking about the sports cars  that disappear off the docks in Genoa  and wind up here. If you don't know  about 'em, who does?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi nods and the Bodyguards step in front of Xander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I heard wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander turns to leave. That's when Anders notices the "X" tattoo on the back of  Xander's head. He gets excited and alerts Yorgi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander Cage!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander turns. Suddenly their whole demeanor changes. All  five guys get up, awed, and push the Bodyguards out of th way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The X man! We seen your bootleg  videos!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sick! You sick crazy on a board,  on a bike! Everything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is insane, man. Xander Cage in  Prague. Come on, sit. Sit with us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi signals for more drinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I remember that one where you jump  the motorcycle over the freeway at  rush hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When else are you gonna do it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You almost died on that one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cops arrested me while I was still  in surgery. Did two months.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We seen all your shit! So you want  cars? We get whatever cars you need.  What are you looking for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ferrari's, Lamborghini's... high end  pasta rockets. Ten to start.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten! No problem! We do that no  problem!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra elbows Anders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten is hardly worth the effort. We're  talking a lousy million five U.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have Japanese buyers who are looking  to move a fleet, if you have the  quality of merchandise they're after.  And it's a mil two, max.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra glances at Yorgi who nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know what a wire transfer is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is she for real? Honey, maybe you  should quiet down and let the grownups  have a conversation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My goodness, a word with four  syllables. I should get some ice  before your brain gets too hot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure. Just chisel some off your heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) So cute. He shows up for a battle of  wits with a mental butter knife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander looks to Yorgi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughing) Don't look at me, X, she handles all  the details.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll work faster if I have an account  number.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra scrawls numbers on a cocktail napkin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll have forty-eight hours to  complete the transfer. Don't waste  our time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander snatches the napkin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wouldn't dream of it. I'm even gonna  throw in a few extra bucks to send  you to charm school.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra glares at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, now that business is  finished, we party! Bitches, come!  We have a drink and toast the deal!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi claps and a flock of strippers descends on the boot Anarchy 99 lifts their glasses. Xander joins in the toast

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I believe I can hang with you fellas  for a while.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the FEET of AGENT POLK sprinting down the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Polk looks around, spots Gibbons. He rushes to him, waving a COMMUNIQUГ‰. Gibbons grabs the communiquГ©, reads it. He looks up, stu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander is having coffee at his window when his communicat RINGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into phone) I guess you got my E-mail. I set up  a purchase. Ten cars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're trying to push my buttons,  you're on the right track. Don't  make me question my own judgment, X.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buddy, you sent me here to get close  to their organization, that costs  money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One point two million dollars? I did  not authorize you to spend one point  two million dollars!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm already on a first name basis  with these dudes, I got a deal set  up, you want me to hammer it or not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not after car thieves here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell am I after? You're  telling me dick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That information is classified. You're  there to gather information on their  operations, period.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call me crazy, but I thought hooking  up a million dollar deal was a great  way to get on their good side. What  else? You gonna hassle me about the  weapons and spy stuff too?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My friend, if you're planning on  crossing me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, poison needles in my shins.  You've got 36 hours. Peace, out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons stands before Sam's desk. Sam scans over the  communiquГ©.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ridiculous. Cut him off. I'm sorry  Gibbons, you pulled up a shark this  time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we should send him whatever  he wants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You what? A wire transfer of this  size?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it means getting Silent Night  back, absolutely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're talking about a very expensive  risk here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gotten closer in 24 hours than  all of the other operatives combined.  He got us an account number to boot.  Now even if he's just dumb and lucky,  I say we back his play. (beat) I put him out there, Sam. If he  doesn't come up with the money,  they'll kill him. I can't let that  happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? You were going to throw him  in a tub full of acid, weren't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, do what you want. But keep  the screws on him. He's a wild card.  That could be either good or bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So the odds are up to fifty-fifty? I  can deal with that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HELICOPTER comes flying in, a MAN standing out on the s He's a disgruntled GADGET WRANGLER from the NSA. His name TOBY LEE SHAVERS. Slovo and Xander watch from a distance as a series of MET CASES is unloaded by CZECH COPS. Slovo lets out a low whi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your government must know something  we don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shavers walks up to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hate those Russkie choppers. Rattle- trap pieces of garbage. I'm agent  Shavers. Toby Lee Shavers. I'm looking  for what's his name. Three X' s.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's would be me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shavers gives him a disapproving look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Figures. You got someplace we can  spread out my gear or what? I mean  today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slovo gestures towards the stairs and Shavers marches off muttering to himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll leave you two alone to talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, thanks a lot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Down in the basement there is a SHOOTING RANGE along one  wall. A squad of CZECH COPS is BLASTING AWAY. They become distracted by the noise in the middle of the room. One of the metal boxes has been dropped by a Cop. The res are spread out in front of Xander, Slovo and Shavers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back off, just go away you klutz.  Alright, here's the story. The items  in these cases belong to me. I  designed them, built them, and was  going to use them in the field myself  until you showed up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I stole your beat, huh? Guess you  forgot to brown-nose the right people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that supposed to be funny? I'm  not laughing. I've worked for ten  years to get my shot at being a field  agent, funny boy. And ar the last  minute I get bumped by you, some  reject from the Ozzfest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you show me some gear before  you get hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to you. Right away, sir,  anything you say, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shavers pops open the first metal case. Inside are variou GADGETS laid into the molded carbon fiber lining.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is all this? I didn't even order  some of this stuff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shavers holds up a small METAL BALL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna need it, rookie, trust  me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The metal ball unrolls into a six legged ROBOT INSECT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An all-terrain mobile video monitoring  system for surveillance. I call it  the "Roach Cam". See the little camera  it's got for a head?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kinda looks like you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shavers snatches it back. He puts on a METAL GLOVE, it's  fingers are SHARP TALONS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Terminator" climbing claws.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He CLAMPS the claw onto the metal case. It holds fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miniature power cams set in on  contact, giving you a sure grip on  any surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They come in any other styles or  colors?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tosses the glove aside, pulls out a DART GUN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your standard dart gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That one I'm real familiar with.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shavers displays a case of DARTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got your chromium knock-out  dart, microphone listening dart,  explosive dart, even one with a  splatter blood packet, whatever you  need. They also come in a special  9mm casing for use with your service  pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander pulls out some SUPER BINOCULARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Multi-view binoculars. Nine different  enhanced vision modes, plus a digital  camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander looks through them, starts cycling through the  different modes. BINOCULAR P.O.V. - we see the various modes as Xander sca the grounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Infrared, starlight... Even a special  "penetrator" mode to see through  walls, curtains, almost anything...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander aims at the shooting range. BINOCULAR P.O.V. - we see through the clothes of the FEMA COPS on the shooting range. (PG-13 style, of course). We even see the INNER WORKINGS of their GUNS. One of the Fem Cops turns and gives Xander an approving look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I'll hang on to these.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think again, that's government  property. You have to sign for  everything. I've got one more that  wasn't on your list.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shavers pulls out a JUMPSUIT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the Beastie Boys collection?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a stakeout suit. It's got food,  water, recording gear, anything you  need for covert spying. It's all- weather, fire retardant, and if you  give this buckle a sharp pull, the  whole outfit deploys into a parachute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're joking, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shavers just gives him a deadpan look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that I've given you the overview,  we're going to spend the next couple  hours going into extensive operational  detail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
