dialogues.text: I thought that was in detail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Shavers drones on, Xander hangs his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TEN BLACK MARKET EUROPEAN SPORTS CARS are loaded on t TRANSPORT TRUCKS. Mafiya BODYGUARDS keep watch. The Ivans (in Teamster garb) inspect the cars while Xande supervises. Anders hovers around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what you think? Beautiful!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitting in an OFFICE watching are Yorgi, Kirill and Petra Petra has a LAPTOP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Has it arrived yet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra checks her computer. ON SCREEN she's monitoring the BANK ACCOUNT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing. He had two days.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps he is not all he says he is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside the Ivans nod approval and Xander heads to the of Yorgi looks to kirill, who puts his hand on his PISTOL. Xander opens the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very nice. I'm impressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm somewhat less so. We seem to  have a bit of a problem...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then Petra's computer BEEPS and the MONEY floods int their account. Xander holds up a CELL PHONE and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had to inspect the merchandise  first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods for Kirill to stand down. OUTSIDE - the two transport trucks are driven off by the  Ivans. As they pull out they reveal ANOTHER CAR under a C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a gift. From me to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anders pulls off the cover, revealing a cherry '72 PONTIA GTO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a little nothing, you take it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander checks out his new ride. Yorgi gets in the passeng seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, get in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander sits behind the wheel and STARTS IT UP. The big en ROARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're alright, Yorgi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next door to the warehouse sits an ABANDONED BUILDING. Up the sloped roof, Slovo spies down on the transaction. He' got a camera with a big zoom lens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smile, bychara.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slovo snaps a few pictures but his view is obscured. To g a better vantage, he JUMPS DOWN onto a lower part of the  roof. CRUNCH! His foot BREAKS THROUGH THE SHABBY ROOF TILE. Down below, Kirill hears the noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all look to the abandoned building. Through the second floor window they can see Slovo's leg  poking through the ceiling. Xander is taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What in the hell...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi turns to Xander, goes for his pistol. Thinking fast, Xander does the same. They draw simultaneously and hold the guns to each other' heads as they sit in the car. Petra, Kirill and Anders dr as well, all of them covering Xander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on, my friend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You tell me! You got a sniper up  there or what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not with us, Xander. He must be  with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (he cocks the hammer) Bullshit! You get your boy off that  roof or I swear to God I'm gonna  give you another hole to breathe out  of.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi stares, finally believes him. He lowers his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get him! Find out who he is!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By now Slovo is down the fire escape. He hits the ground goes running down the street. The Anarchy 99 crew heads for their cars. Xander SPINS th cylinder on his REVOLVER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got him. Buckle up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GTO peels out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slovo is huffing and puffing as fast as he can when Xande comes skidding around the corner. He looks back and sees speeding GTO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the cop from the club!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander does the only thing he can. He puts the car sidewa and aims out the window as he slides to a stop. Slovo turns and BLAM! Xander SHOOTS Slovo right in the ch IN SLO-MO: a spray of BLOOD erupts from his chest and Slo falls backwards, his face frozen in a look of shock and  betrayal. The smoking shell clatters to the ground. Slovo blinks up at Xander, gasping for words, then lays s Xander hops out, rifles through Slovo's pockets. The othe Anarchy 99 cars pull up, the whole group looking on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Get in the car!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander heads back to the GTO and the cars peel out.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: The rest of Anarchy 99 follows behind the GTO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't believe it! You can't shoot  a cop in the middle of the street!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (grim) Had to do what I had to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls out the roll of FILM. Yorgi laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You say you get a million, you get  the million. Some cop gives us shit,  he's dead. Jesus Christ, man, you're  hard-core!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ivans pull up in their transport trucks. They see all the blood and rush towards Slovo. But something doesn't l right. Ivan 1 TASTES the blood and spits it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's sweet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ivan 2 pulls a CHROME DART from Slovo's chest. Slovo GROA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a crowded basement rave club. Hot and sweaty RAVERS  dance in provocative outfits. The Anarchy 99 group is sta on the best booth, right on the packed dance floor. Surrounding them are a handful of MAFIYA BODYGUARDS who s at attention like the Secret Service. Anders swings from a water pipe and then drops onto the t smashing glass. A DRUNK GUY tries to pull Petra onto the dance floor and PUNCHES him. The Bodyguards drag the dude out for a prope thrashing. Yorgi shatters a BOTTLE against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Total chaos, man! Welcome to Anarchy  99!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's "Anarchy 99"?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all this craziness! It's what  we've been living since 99, when we  left the Army. One of our brothers  died in Grozny and we said the hell  with this shit. What for? He dies  for what? Politics? Who's politics?  Not ours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanna see my politics?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander shows him a TATTOO on his arm. It shows PLANET EAR with a giant SCREW through it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Screw the world. If I'm gonna die  for something, it better be bitches  and money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I'm talking about, man!  That's why Anarchy 99 was born.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi rolls up his sleeve, revealing an Anarchy 99 tat (a circled "A" with "99" underneath).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To us it means no walls, no speed  limits, no jails. It's everybody  does what he wants. People think  democracy is freedom but they don't  have a clue. There's an old punk  song. It says: "America stands for  freedom, but if you think you're  free..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "...try walking into a deli and  urinating on the cheese". 'Anarchy  Burger' by the Vandals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got it, man. It's stupid but  it's true. True freedom is when you  do whatever you want anytime you  want. That's when you know you're  living, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How you gonna do that with government  and rules everywhere?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy. You get enough money that you  grow an ass big enough for the whole  world to kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi throws a fistful of money onto the dance floor. The Xed out ravers swat it around like confetti.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You hang with us, buddy, taste some  freedom! Petra! Dance with this guy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi melts into the dance floor crowd, leaving Xander al with Petra. She gets up grumpily and starts dancing. Xand joins her, but she won't even look at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is great, dancing with the back  of your head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reluctantly turns around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you got a problem with me, why  are we dancing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi asked me to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do everything Yorgi says?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go to hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's gonna be like that, huh? You  got all bent out of shape as soon as  he started dancing with someone else.  Why's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mind your business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you guys used to date? That's  it, right? He broke your heart and  you're still soft on him. That's  funny, it don't seem to fit with a  tough broad like you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She glares at him and walks away. Xander follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you still hanging around?  Your business is finished, you should  go home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was invited. What's your story?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know who you are or where  you come from, but I don't like you.  You ask too many questions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a big line outside the "ladies" and no line at th "men's". Petra heads into the Men's Room. Some DUDE whistles at her. She pushes him out of the way enters a stall. Xander leans on the sink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, don't front like that. You'll  put a guy right off you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't even bother, X man, I'm not  your type.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That right? Why's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stall door flies open and Petra marches out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My chest is too small and my brain  is too big.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She shoves him to the door and stomps back to her stall. Xander walks back out, shaking his head and laughing. Across the room, Viktor shoves the D.J. out of the way an puts on "ANARCHY BURGER" by the Vandals. The rave dance i interrupted by the pounding punk beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander, check it out! The revolution  begins!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Viktor and Anders swiftly turn the dance floor into a vio mosh pit. Xander can't help it, he actually likes these g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get some air, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi and Xander head outside. A moment later, Kirill hur out another door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's late. Yorgi and Xander stroll along the river.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got a great set-up here Yorgi.  You really know how to live.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a beautiful town, Prague. It's  been good to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been here before, when I was a  kid. My old man was in the service,  we used to live on the Army base in  Hamburg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You, an Army brat? I don't see that  one at all. Did you join the service  as well?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hell no. My dad was a straight up  tin soldier. Somehow he pissed this  general off and got himself  dishonorably discharged. Had a court  martial and everything. The charges  were total bullshit, so he was sure  he'd get his name cleared, but it  didn't happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Connections and politics, it's the  same everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My old man, he bought into the system,  and it screwed him. So he swallowed  a bullet. Me, I don't believe in  nothing I can't see and touch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera suddenly ZOOMS across the city, flying over st and houses until, half a mile away, it finds Kirill in a  window with his SNIPER RIFLE. P.O.V. THROUGH SCOPE - Xander's head is in the crosshairs The scope pans over to Yorgi, who looks INTO CAMERA and g a small signal, calling off the hit.

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON YORGI AND XANDER
dialogues.text: Yorgi looks up at a "PRAGUE PEACE CONFERENCE" banner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next week these idiots are having a  peace conference here. What the hell  are they going to talk about? It's  the system itself that causes all  the world's problems. You're okay,  buddy. Come on, it's getting early.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stroll off and Kirill stands down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A flotilla of VEHICLES (Xander's GTO among them) drives  through the gate in a massive, stone wall. It's a big man house in the middle of town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GTO, sedans, SUV's park in the courtyard. Xander sees row of MOTORCYCLES parked here as well. Xander also sees a Guard hit a switch that LOWERS the HEA WOODEN GATE. Yorgi corrals a bunch of STRIPPERS he's brought home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This way, girls, let's go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He leads the whole troop inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they go down the hall/Xander sees ROOMS FULL OF OFFICE WORKERS and MAFIYA GOONS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Diversified global operations. The  sun never sets on our empire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander takes in WORLD MAPS, FAX MACHINES, BANKS OF COMPUT For all their screwing around, it's clear Anarchy 99 runs large operation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With leaded glass windows overlooking the river, this pla is beautiful. Inside it's done up more like the house fro MTV's "Real World", except trashed. There's cool fish tan a pool table, PS2 on a flatscreen and spray paint and hol all over the walls. SERVANTS welcome them with food and Yorgi's SECRETARY giv him important messages.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sorting through  messages) Not bad, yes? The original owners,  they just one day decide to move  out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anders starts pounding on a drumset. Petra kicks a soccer ball at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeb vas, z'opa. Shut up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi paws at a Stripper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got meetings this afternoon,  I've got to get some sleep. Just  pick a girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's alright, I'm kinda tired.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to insult me? This is my  hospitality. Pick one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander points at one of the Strippers. She's wearing a  fashionable FLAK JACKET.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good, now find a room to crash in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra, show him. The surly Petra opens a door, revealing a hall of doors. Xander and Flak Jacket follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gonna tuck us in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She just gives him a nasty look, walks into her room and  slams the door. Xander scratches his head and picks a roo The others shuffle off to their beds with their Strippers

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flak Jacket is out of sight in the bathroom. Xander talks her while he gets undressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, no offense, but I'm not in  the market right now, okay? You can  stay here, but let's not --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He trails off as she steps out of the bathroom. She's wea just a G-string and the flak jacket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't understand a word I'm  saying, do you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She just smiles at him sweetly and pulls his shirt off. S looks at the ENGAGEMENT RING still pierced through his ni and gives a puzzled look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stupid, right? That's what I was  trying to tell you. I just got out  of this heavy thing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She kisses him and lets the flak jacket fall (PG-13 style

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The things I have to do for my  country.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gives in and starts making out with her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander sneaks out of his room and down the hail. Behind h we can see Flak Jacket asleep amongst the tussled sheets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anders is snoring on the floor. Xander skirrs around him goes through another door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander finds an office and starts going through the desk. finds a PALM PILOT and snaps a RECORDING DEVICE to the bo In seconds he's copied everything on it. He moves on to s drawers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns, sees Petra standing in the doorway with a GUN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking for a phone book. I want to  call a cab. Unless you wanna give me  a ride?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She shuts the door, advances, staring him down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hung out last night, remember?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I also remember you drove your car  here. Who are you really? Make no  mistake, I will shoot you and not  feel bad about it. Who are you working  for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, take it easy. I'm just a dude  trying to make a buck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She SLAPS him, hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullshit. I see you look at  everything, study everything, ask  questions. I know exactly what you're  doing. Empty your pockets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got to relax, baby, you're  paranoid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She SLAPS him again and Xander goes for her gun. Before h can pry it from her hand, she's pulled another gun from  nowhere and has it jammed against his neck. He lets go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you're good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we should start again, yes? I  know so little about you, except  that you're not what you say you  are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That makes two of us then, sweetheart,  because I ain't buying your bullshit  either. You're not like them, I can  see it in your eyes. So you tell me,  who's bullshitting who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are THREE STRIPPERS asleep in bed. Yorgi is sitting his COMPUTER in his underwear. He's hacked in to the CZECH POLICE network.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something bothers me about you, Mr.  Xander Cage...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks around a bit, doesn't find what he's looking for He sits up, getting pissed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get Kirill. Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She heads out. Yorgi goes to the bathroom, splashes water his face. Kirill enters, still half asleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the problem?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm inside the police mainframe. Do  you see anything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill studies the screen while Yorgi pulls on clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've searched their E-mail. No funeral  announcement, no obituary, no call- to-arms. Nothing on the news, even.  I swear I saw a cop get shot  yesterday. How come no one is talking  about it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill looks back at the screen. Nothing there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I also check the wire transfer. I  follow the money back to it's source,  but there is no source. It comes  from nowhere. First they bring CIA,  then British SAS, now maybe they  plumb the lower depths. Maybe now  they send someone who looks like us.  Maybe someone like our houseguest  Mr. X.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra still has the gun on Xander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what you're talking  about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The eyes don't lie. All this has  gotten to you, hasn't it, Petra? You  came in as Yorgi's girlfriend and  you stayed because it was fun. Now  you don't like it so much, but you're  in so deep you can't get out anymore.  Tell me if I'm wrong, Petra.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go to hell!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at you. You're helping run things  now. You're a gangster. I bet that  snuck up on you. You woke up one day  and you were a criminal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls back the hammer on her gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's cool, I feel you. I might even  be able to help. Here, let me show  you something. You wanna see what's  in my pocket, I'll show you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He makes a move and she jabs the gun at him. She reaches  into the pocket for him and pulls out his little data  recorder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm an information gatherer. You  wanna go somewhere and talk about  it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi creeps down the hall, Kirill in tow. They both scre SILENCERS onto their PISTOLS. They flatten themselves up against the wall and prepare t burst into Xander's room. One... Two... THREE! They kick in the door and aim their guns around. Flak Jacket sits up, terrified. Yorgi and Kirill lower their guns. Viktor stumbles by in underwear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They went to breakfast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a beautiful and historic Prague location with WIN and a nice view. It's rather fancy and PACKED with UPSCAL PATRONS. Petra and Xander sit in the middle of the room,  sticking out badly in their grungy clothes. A WAITER takes their order.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perogies, potato pancakes, fried  goose livers, the sausage plate and  a pot of Turkish coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just gonna have a garden salad.  Oil and balsamic vinegar on the side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Waiter takes off. Petra puffs on a cigarette, staring Xander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's how you eat? It's like a  gerbil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shrugs) I'm from L.A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So why don't you tell me something  about who you gather information  for. They obviously have very deep  pockets. Are you from a rival clan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's just say I'm freelancing and  leave it at that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoever sent you knew what they were  doing. You and Yorgi are practically  twins. Two nihilistic fashion victims  who make a lot of noise but don't  say much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't judge a comic book by it's  cover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You agree with a lot of what he says,  don't you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know where he's coming from. The  only thing I really don't get is why  he dumped you. Up until I found that  out, I thought his judgment was pretty  sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't even start. I'll be honest, I  don't trust you. Bur lets pretend  for a minute that what you say is  true, that I want to leave. What can  you do about it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The people I know want facts, the  kinds of things an insider would  know. They're interested in putting  Anarchy 99 out of business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All I have to do is risk my life  providing you with these facts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We could work together. Then maybe  we could both get the hell out of  here. There's a beach in Bora Bora  with my name on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beach named X? That I'd like to  see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So there you have it. I guess you  just have to ask yourself, how bad  to you want out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She thinks on it. Then her cell phone RINGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into phone) Da!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on phone) Listen very carefully, Petra. We  think Cage may be an American agent,  do you understand what I'm telling  you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into phone) Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on phone) Don't worry, I've got your back. I'm  right across the street, above the  bakery. Just bring him outside and  let me do the rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill hangs up. She looks back at Xander, shell shocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's up? Is there a problem?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She studies his eyes, decides to risk it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They tell me you're an American agent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no more time for games. They  made you. There's a sniper out front  waiting to put a bullet in your eye.  Tell me if it's true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a long story, but yeah, more or  less.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ. You're going to have  to go out the back. The data that  you copied with your toy. Tomorrow,  at six o'clock. Look it up. We're  taking a trip. Be there at six and  you'll have plenty to tell your  people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I go out the back, he'll know  you've warned me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's alright, I'll figure something  out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not an option. Just get up slowly  like everything's cool. Petra, trust  me. You just hung yourself out to  dry for me, I'm not gonna let you  down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill lays on his stomach, peering into the scope of his SILENCED SNIPER RIFLE. P.O.V. Through scope - he can faintly see them inside the crowded restaurant. Xander and Petra are making their way towards the exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice and easy, Petra...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They work their way through the lunchtime crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't let this happen. I want you  to go out the back. I'll make up  some excuse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll kill you, you know they will.  Besides, there is no back door. Keep  smiling. Ready? Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander's timed it perfectly so that just as they get to t door, a BUS passes by. Kirill keeps focused, waiting for the bus to pass. P.O.V. THROUGH SCOPE - Xander's head is sporadically visi through the bus windows. Kirill's finger tightens on the trigger... As soon as the bus passes he FIRES! But Xander's not there, he's ducked down to tie his shoe. CRASH! The glass door behind him shatters. Feigning surpr Xander PUNCHES PETRA IN THE FACE and sprints down the blo He runs bent low, the parked cars protecting him from the sniper. Kirill fires anyway, taking out car windows. At the end of the block is a long staircase with a METAL  RAIL down the middle. As he runs by an outdoor restaurant Xander snatches the  SERVING TRAY from a startled WAITER, sending food and dri flying. He hops on the serving tray like it's a skateboard and do a RAIL-SLIDE down the length of the stairs. He's moving t fast for Kirill. He jumps off at the bottom and the tray POPS UP INTO THE  AIR. Kirill BLASTS it like a clay pigeon. By now Xander is out of sight. Kirill pounds his rifle in frustration. Petra gets to the top of the stairs. She gives Kirill a " did he go?" look. Her nose is bloody, helping to sell her performance. Then she turns and looks off after Xander. She sees his G speeding away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're looking down at a SHIP moving through the fjord, se from high above. It's towing a SMALLER BOAT behind it. An airplane? No, we're at the top of the Trollveggen, Norway legendary "Troll Wall". It's a near 5,000 foot sheer drop the ocean. Six figures stand at the edge of the barren cliff. They w webbed "squirrel" jumpsuits, helmets and parachutes. On e thigh they have pistols and on their chests they have sil MP-5 sub-machine guns. Together they stare down at the sh Petra is among them. She looks down at her watch. It is  precisely 5:59PM. She glances around. The top of the clif is rocky and flat. Xander is nowhere to be seen. FIFTY YARDS AWAY - we see Xander sneaking forward militar style. He's got his "stakeout suit" on and is keeping low

dialogues.speaker: HE CHECKS HIS WATCH
dialogues.text: The members of Anarchy 99 put on their goggles and, witho saying a word, they leap off the Troll Wall. Xander runs to the edge and looks down. He sees the group freefailing down the sheer cliff face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The six plummet away from him at incredible speed. In a h arch, they peak at 120 m.p.h. Then, using the webbed wings under their arms and between their legs, they go into aerodynamic "track" positions an rocket away from the wall. Like dark angels, they soar out over the water in formati

dialogues.speaker: ON THE SHIP BELOW --
dialogues.text: The ship below is a scientific research vessel. On the de a few SAILORS and SCIENTISTS watch the sun set. The six dark figures close in rapidly. At the last moment they pull their chutes and deftly glid towards the ship. A sailor looks up and spots them. Before he can shout, he's SHOT IN THE LEG and goes down. Seconds later, they're on the deck, tearing off their rig They race across the deck, taking over the ship in a surg manner. They herd everyone back heading for the bridge. Petra hangs back. She looks back at the cliff, up towards Xander. XANDER'S P.O.V. Through his SUPER BINOCULARS we see them storming the bri As they head inside, they disappear from view. Xander hits a button on the side of the binoculars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see what's going on inside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now he can see THROUGH THE WALLS OF THE SHIP. He sees THE CREW, herded into a room and LOCKED IN by Ana 99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anarchy 99 seals the door, locking the crew away. They sl five and bump chests, still totally amped up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON - a LARGE SUBMERSIBLE VEHICLE. It's white and tw feet long. There are MOTORS on either side and a PANEL OF SOLAR CELLS on the top of a periscope-like projection ris from the back. This is the AHAB DEVICE. It sits in the WET WELL at the b of the ship, ready to be launched out the back sea doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a SMALLER BOAT moored to the back of the ship. Kirill and Viktor hop onto it's deck. They start to WHIST as they work. Sounds like the "Andy Griffith" theme. XANDER'S BINOCULARS P.O.V. He takes DIGITAL PHOTOS of the Ahab device.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you guys stealing?

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON THE SHIP
dialogues.text: The smaller boat is launched and ready to do. Yorgi goes the WET WELL CONTROLS and hits a switch. The aft doors open, letting water into the wet well. In  seconds Ahab starts to float. Anders loosens it from it's moorings and they TIE AHAB TO THE BACK OF THE SMALLER BOA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi hits another switch, opening the BALLAST DOORS on t port side of the ship. Air flows out, causing the ship to list to one side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It all happened so fast. Such an  unfortunate accident.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi MACHINE GUNS the wet well control panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They climb onto the boat. Petra is the last to board. She looks up towards Xander and MACHINE GUNS the panel some m making sure he notices. XANDER'S P.O.V. He sees the smaller boat pulling away, the Ahab device be towed behind. He pans over and ZOOMS IN on the shot-up co panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pans over to the wet well and sees it's flooding. With the ballast open on only one side, the ship starts  LISTING. The thing is going down. He pans over, clicks into "penetrator" mode, and sees the Crew pounding on the walls below decks. They're trapped,  their WRISTS AND ANKLES BOUND WITH PLEXI-CUFFS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander puts down the binoculars and gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way, man, no way. I'm just supposed  to be an observer. Aw shit. This job  sucks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pats his jumpsuit, checking for the buckle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toby Lee Shavers, if this thing don't  work, your ass is kicked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander steels himself, takes a few deep breaths. Then he sprints to the edge and JUMPS off the cliff... And that's it. He's gone. One mile, straight down. Suddenly we're falling with him. We hear the rush of air as he free-falls a dozen feet fro the craggy rock face. The force of the wind ripples his cheeks. He streamlines himself into a track position and jets awa from the cliff like Superman. Before he gets too low, he RIPS THE BUCKLE. Immediately his jumpsuit TEARS OFF HIS BODY in MULTIPLE  LAYERS, unfurling into a full sized PARASAIL. Xander looks up at his parasail, relieved, and glides tow the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra spots the parasail and has to act quickly to keep Y from spotting it. She grabs him suddenly and KISSES him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd forgotten how exciting it is  working together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been so quiet lately, Petra,  I thought you no longer cared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't we go below decks and work  off some of this adrenaline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) Viktor! Stay the course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi kisses her again and heads to the cabin below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander comes in for a perfect landing. He lands on the li deck and undoes his harness. He sees several WOUNDED scattered on the deck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Son of a bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks across the water, sees the smaller boat far away

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra looks back one last time, catching sight of Xander the deck of the ship. She smiles, relieved. Then she turns solemn as she heads below decks to pay the price.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander gets to the wet well and sees the water flooding i With the ship listing like this, the water is pouring bel decks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander opens a hatch and lowers himself into the hold. He is where the entire Crew has been left to drown. They are struggling to stay above water, their hands and feet boun As the far end of the room is another HATCH. Water pours from this one and Xander has to get it shut. He swims through the struggling Crew, spots the CAPTAIN  holding his YOUNG SON above water. The water is rising  rapidly, filling up the compartment. Xander braces his feet against the bulkhead and PUSHES, b the force of the water is too much. He surfaces. He's got to wait until the room floods befor he can close that door. He watches as the Crew goes into a panic, the water risin up to the ceiling. They are gasping in the last foot of a that's available. He sees the Captain's Son, crying and  clutching at his father. Xander takes a deep breath and dives down. He grabs the h door, braces his feet and PULLS. His muscles strain as the heavy metal door slowly swings  SHUT. Xander surfaces and swims to the ladder. He CUTS the Capt plastic cuffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is the boy alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. I will cut the others loose,  you must run the bilge pumps!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain takes the knife and swims to free his men. Xander takes the Captain's Son and climbs up the ladder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander scans the controls but has no idea what he's looki for. The Captain's Son shows him the right switch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Son nods and Xander flips the switch. MOTORS start to HUM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bilge pumps spew out water furiously. Crew members co up from below decks. They are soaked and grateful. They g about tending to the wounded as Xander slumps down next t the exhausted Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain, huh? You get a lot of broads  with that uniform?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both laugh, relieved, as the ship slowly rights itse

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander is in a room with the SCIENTISTS from the ship. Th have blueprints of the torpedo spread out. The Captain's is wrapped in BLANKETS, shivering. Xander is talking to Gibbons on his communicator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into communicator) They call it "Ahab", it's a solar  powered submersible. It can  circumnavigate the globe on it's  own. They use it to track and study  the migration patterns of whales.

dialogues.speaker: GIBBONS IN THE ULTIMATE INFORMATION ROOM
dialogues.text: Gibbons jots down the information furiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did say "Ahab"? You're sure about  that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I sent you pictures. Here's  what I'm thinking. If they take out  the cameras and sensors, they could  probably put a bomb in this thing.  You drop it in the water in the Red  Sea and three weeks later it's  swimming up the Potomac.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is good work, X, damn fine work.  You need to press on at all costs,  find out what they have planned with  this "Ahab".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, one miracle at a time. They're  on to me now, remember?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna be en route with a team  shortly to relieve you. Just keep  the pressure on until the cavalry  arrives. And X? You done yourself  proud helping those people today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander tussles the hair of the Captain's Son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a grungy little phoenix, you  know that? Keep up the good work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ain't seen nothing yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GTO screeches into the lot. Shavers is on his way out with his SUITCASE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in. We've got work to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAN OVER WEAPONS - they're all laid out on the floor. 50  cal. MACHINE GUNS, MINES, ROCKETS, BELTS OF AMMO. We finally arrive at Xander leaning on his GTO. He sparks BLOWTORCH and lights a CIGAR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want all that... (he pats the GTO) In there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shavers looks on in shock. He's got a crew of MECHANICS w him. Xander hands him the blowtorch and walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a beautiful open air market in a town square  surrounded by old buildings. The place is PACKED. In the midst of it all, we make out Petra moving through crowd. She stops to look at some vegetables when Xander p by her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right behind you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They keep talking, pretending to shop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what's the plan with this Ahab?  Are they selling it or what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, something worse. He says it's a  surprise, but I know him. This is  his masterpiece.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to find out what it is.  Can you handle that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat) There's something I didn't have time  to tell you before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a agent as well. KGB. I've been  undercover for over a year.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're what? What the hell have you  been doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. Eight months ago I  stop hearing from my people. No  explanation, just silence. So I stay  and I wait like I was told. Soon I'm  in so far, they'd kill me if I left.  Now every day I get farther and  farther away from what I was. I'm  like you said, a criminal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm busted up for you, but Jesus,  what the hell are you doing? Those  people almost drowned on that boat  and you didn't lift a finger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This stings her. She knows well the price she paid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I guess I've been no help at all  to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get your head back in the game. There  are lives at stake here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course. I'll do what I can. I  have to go, before they notice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When can I see you again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't, it's too risky. I'm not  much help anyway, remember?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then she's off into the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The craggy surface of the wall is swathed in shadows. Xan approaches and flattens himself against it. He's all in B packed with weapons and sporting a COMBAT VEST. He grabs a toehold on the wall and ZOOM! He SPEED CLIMBS the side. He reaches the top in seconds and scopes out the manor ho VIDEO CAMERAS, PATROLLING GUARDS. It's not gonna be easy. Xander slips over the wall down to the courtyard below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander places an EXPLOSIVE on a CONTROL BOX. He waits for a GUARD to stroll by and then slips through basement window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander makes his way through a series of rooms. Finally h finds himself in a study with a window overlooking the  CAVERNOUS BASEMENT of the Manor. Laid out below he can see the AHAB DEVICE, hanging from  chains. TECHIES are working with the Anarchy 99 crew to  RETROFIT the thing. They are installing a LAUNCHER RACK of TEN TUBES. Xander can't hear a thing through the thick glass. He takes a METAL BALL from his pocket. There's a sink in corner and he drops the metal ball down the drain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We follow the metal ball as it rolls through the trap and down into the wall. The pipe zigzags around like a  rollercoaster and then levels off. The ball rolls past a T-intersection, stops, and unrolls  like a pill bug. Six metal legs appear and we see it's the ROACH CAM. It  scuttles back up the pipe and makes the turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're close on a sink as the Roach Cam comes up the pipe. scurries into hiding just as a HAND reaches in to turn on the water. The roach peers out from between items on a workbench and PUSH IN on it's VIDEO CAMERA head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see a handheld video image of Viktor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, fire one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Viktor pushes a button on Ahab and a VODKA BOTTLE launche from tube one, SHATTERING against the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perfect!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull back to reveal Xander watching the image on his  communicator. Using a joystick he's able to control the r He steers the camera towards Petra, gets a low-angle shot her legs in a punked-out CATHOLIC SCHOOL GIRL SKIRT. He smiles, enjoying himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great piece of hardware.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He plugs his earpiece in and listens in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra works on a COMPUTER CONTROLLER. The roach scurries across the floor, circling to get a be look at Ahab. Anders pushes a CART holding TEN GLASS CANISTERS OF LIQUI Each canister is separated in two, with a BLACK LIQUID on top and a WHITE LIQUID on the bottom. He hands the canisters to Viktor one by one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (singing) "Silent Night... Holy Night"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Viktor laughs and joins in. Then Kirill looks down and SPOTS THE ROACH CAM. He STOMPS it with his boot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander jerks out his earpiece and rubs his ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks down into the room, sees Kirill bending down to  examine the roach. Time to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill lifts the dead "roach" and sees its wires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's some bullshit going on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi hits an ALARM switch, alerting the guards. The Anarchy boys grab weapons and start racing through th house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Anarchy boys move swiftly from room to room in practi close combat maneuvers. Cueing each other with hand signals, they run through eac room, weapons ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander sprints down the hallway. With the Anarchy 99 boys and Guards roaming the house, he's having a hard time fin his way out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs into a darkened dining hall, sprints across only find the opposite door locked. He hides behind one of the many COLUMNS as his pursuers enter the room. Kirill gives a thumbs up and puts on a pair of NIGHT VISI GOGGLES. He scans the big room but sees nothing. Xander, hidden at the opposite end, waits breathlessly. Kirill advances slowly, his buddies covering him from the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander, my friend, that can only be  you. Why don't we put our weapons  down for a few minutes and discuss  this like friends. How would you  like to come to work for us instead?  We could Rage Against the Machine  together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Across the room, Xander sees a small window leading to th courtyard. He has to run across open ground to reach it. calls out to Yorgi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Speaking of people that are full of  shit, funny you should mention those  guys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander's voice echoes around the empty hall, making it  impossible to pinpoint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They put their records out through  Sony, one of the biggest corporate  machines on the planet. Some  revolutionaries, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls out his gun as Kirill creeps ever closer. Against the far wall Xander spots a FIRE EXTINGUISHER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, you're the one who's fooling  yourself. Why risk your life for  your government when we can offer  you a future that is truly free?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill is almost on top of him. Xander sights up and FIRES. The fire extinguisher EXPLODES, blinding Kirill. Xander makes a run for it. Everyone FIRES WILDLY (except for Petra), bullets tearing tapestries off the walls. Xander dives and crashes through the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander tuck and rolls, comes up running. Guards are running around, unsure just what the hell is g on. Xander hops on one of the TRIALS MOTORCYCLES parked nearb and fires up the engine. He hits a remote switch and BLAM The EXPLOSIVE CHARGE he left earlier blows-up. He points the bike at a set of STONE STAIRS. They form a  "ramp" that he can use to JUMP THE WALL. He GUNS THE ENGI A Guard races across the wall with a rifle, taking aim. Xander races and JUMPS THE BIKE over the wail. As he goes he does a CAN-CAN AERIAL, KICKING THE GUARD OFF THE WALL  before he can shoot. The Anarchy 99 guys run outside just in time to see him g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He blew the gate control. Anders!  Get the bastard!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anders fires up the other trials bike, slings a submachin gun across his back and goes up and over. Petra watches h go, hoping for the best.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (NOTE: action will be re-choreographed based on actual  locations. Any freestyle motorcycle moves will be motivat by a physical reason) Xander blazes down the street, Anders racing right behind him. A wrong turn sends him into a dead end. At the end is a panel truck parked next to a stone wall. Xander slows the trials bike and drives it up the hood of the truck and onto it's roof. Balancing on the rear wheel he hops onto the wall. The machine gun blasts again. Xander drives off along the top of the wall. Anders shoulders his gun and follows. They are riding a 15' high wall that's only a foot wide. They make several 90 degree turns, racing above a sleepin neighborhood. Xander sees the end of the wall ahead and t a detour. He hops onto the second floor balcony of a BUILDING UNDER CONSTRUCTION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CONSTRUCTION WORKERS bolt out of the way as the motorcycl leaps into their building. Xander pops a wheelie and slams through a BLUEPRINT TABLE Anders follows, demolishing their SNACK TABLE. Xander darts through the building, between beams and 2 x  4's, until he reaches a skeletal STAIRCASE. More WORKERS appear at the bottom of the stairs so Xander goes up. He cranks up three flights of stairs and bashes  onto the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander looks around for a way out. The next building isn' that far away. He revs up and JUMPS ACROSS. Anders jams another magazine into his sub-machine gun and follows Xander. They jump from roof to roof, down a DESCENDING SERIES OF  ROOFTOPS towards the river. Anders pulls up alongside as  they race towards that last apartment building. Neck and neck they head for the brink. At the last jump,  Xander pulls up behind Anders. They hit the last roof in a crunch of gravel. Anders clam on the brakes and comes skidding to a stop, Xander right  behind him. They skid to a stop at the very edge, with Anders balance on his front wheel. He looks down, sees street five stori below. He glances back at Xander, sweat beading, struggling to k his balance. Xander observes him coolly, totally in contr Anders reaches for his machine gun. Xander pops a wheelie and RAMS Anders over the edge. The bike tumbles and PANCAKES into the pavement. Anders t through several AWNINGS before slamming into the ground. Xander turns and rides to the next apartment building. He hops down a steep series of roofs that will eventually take him to street level. As he makes his way down, Anders stirs. The guy is a bloo broken mess but he gets to his feet. He sees where Xander headed and he scurries off to intercept him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander is heading to the far end of a dead end alley. The only way out is fenced in. But there's a RAMP leading up a LOADING DOCK. Xander will have to use that ramp to jump the fence. Anders climbs to the second floor of the building. There a small crane arm loaded with metal. If he pushes it at t right time, it will swing out and knock Xander from his b He giggles maniacally, blood dripping. Xander drops down into the alley and heads towards the ju Anders times it perfectly and swings the crane arm out. IN SLOW MOTION: The bike leaves the ramp and soars up ove the fence. The crane arm swings out, on a collision course with Xand Xander sees it and THROWS HIMSELF OFF THE BIKE, grabbing  onto the back in a SUPERMAN SEAT-GRAB. He passes RIGHT  UNDERNEATH the swinging crane arm. Anders's face falls when he sees Xander go by, hanging on with ONE HAND. In his OTHER HAND Xander's got his PISTOL.

dialogues.speaker: BLAP
dialogues.text: Xander pulls himself back onto the bike and lands. He sto sees Anders' BLOODY HELMET come bouncing into the alley. tucks his pistol away and roars off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander comes up the stairs and sees LIGHTS ON in his  apartment. He draws his gun and pushes the door open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slovo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slovo is sitting in the armchair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude, what are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You killed me, remember? Now I have  to hide out here with you. Where  have you been?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander holsters his gun, searches around for his communic

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I found something big enough for us  to take these guys down with. They've  got a of nerve agent they're gonna  unleash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this what you're looking for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander turns to see Slovo waving the communicator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, give it here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slovo raises his pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, "dude".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stunned beat) What's the deal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh come on, don't feel bad. You got  played, so what? You're new at this.  Did you think you could just stroll  into this business one day and have  all the angles figured out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why you dogging me up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shrugs) They came and found me. They said  they'd kill me unless I help them.  Plus they offer me a lot of money.  No big deal. These things happen.  Dump your gun on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander does so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where do you want it? The head to be  quick? Or the chest for an open  casket?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly GUNFIRE blasts through the closed door. Bullets shatter a LAMP, a PICTURE, and finally tag Slovo a wild salvo. Slovo crumples, never knowing what hit him. The door creaks open. It's Petra, her gun still smoking. She's with the Ivans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you doing? You  could've killed me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shrugs) I heard you talking. I could tell  where you were in the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what's going on anymore.  I thought I was square with that  dude. Now everybody's switching sides  like it's the WWF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ivans go to Slovo's body, kicking the gun from his ha One of them SPITS on his corpse in disgust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing with the Ivans?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know which cops are good and which  are bad. Come with me. Come on, right  now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She drags him to the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The beautiful and historic St. Charles bridge spans the r There are BANNERS hanging in celebration of the coming PR PEACE CONFERENCE. Petra leads Xander across it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're getting out of this place.  We've done enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute, whoa. We can't go  now. What's Yorgi got planned with  that nerve agent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't matter anymore, forget  it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course it matters. Hey, hold on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we owe our governments? Yours  kidnapped you, mine abandoned me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra, this ain't about the people  that sent us here, you know that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, now it's about us. Let's do  something for us before we both get  killed. Don't you want to get to  Bora Bora, Xander?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't leave now. We have to do  something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? You're the one who believes in  nothing. Screw the world, or whatever  you said.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander grabs her by shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, so I was full of shit. I  thought believing in things was wrong.  Turns out believing in nothing is  worse. You might as well be dead.  I'm not thrilled with the world, but  I'm not gonna let those idiots start  killing people. Come on, you're a  cop, we've got to get these guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gotten through to her. She nods in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They left. To a fortress in the  mountains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll have to go after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aren't you afraid?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long time ago I learned how to put  fear away in a little place in my  head. Maybe that's my problem. If  you don't feel fear you can do some  amazing things, but you can also  screw your life up in ways you can't  imagine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I must be healthy, then, because I'm  scared to death. I guess I'd better  get back to Yorgi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't have to do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I do. You're right. I can't  just let him go free. Besides, I can  help you from the inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aren't they gonna wonder were you've  been?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shrugs) I was supposed to wait for the cop  to kill you and then kill the cop.  They'll believe me. (beat) I've been lying for so long, one  more time won't hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When this is over, we're just gonna  take off, the two of us. Take a  vacation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are we doing? We're  doing all this together, trusting  each other, making plans, and we  haven't even slept together yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander kisses her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That gives us something to live for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Together they walk back across the bridge. We crane up,  revealing the PRAGUE PEACE CONFERENCE banners all over a BUILDING on the river.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see a craggy, gnarly mountain. The front side is a roc strewn, near vertical drop. Then we see Xander come scaling up from the back side. He got GEAR strapped to his back and it looks like it's been helluva climb. Xander sits at the very peak and catches his breath. It's beautiful up here. He pulls a COLLAPSIBLE SNOWBOARD off his back, hits a swi and the thing SWITCHBLADES OUT to full size. He clamps it his feet. Xander moves to the edge and peers down. At the bottom of the mountain he can see the CASTLE, an imposing medieval  fortress in the snow. He leans over the edge and starts d the mountain. He doesn't get far before he notices someth else. He slides to a stop on the near vertical face, clin to rocks for balance. On the mountain below him, between him and the castle, is GUARD OUTPOST. Right now he's in full view and he's been  spotted. He sees GUARDS scrambling out, hopping on  SNOWMOBILES. From up here they look like ants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Viktor, the goateed cold weather warrior, strides out of Outpost and looks up the mountain. He shouts orders to hi men. A Guard runs up and brings him his weapon: A FLAME-THROWE Viktor straps it on and. climbs onto his SNOWMOBILE. All around him the Guards are driving into position. They form a gauntlet of AK-47's. There must be a DOZEN of them Viktor rides up twenty yards and waits, his engine idling

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold positions!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He squints up at the speck that is Xander.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander pulls a CONCUSSION GRENADE from his jacket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing like fresh powder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He puts his goggles on and pulls the pin from the grenade Then he TOSSES IT OVER HIS SHOULDER. The grenade lands in the snow above him and starts ROLLIN DOWNHILL TOWARDS HIM. Xander pushes off and starts bombin down the mountain. The grenade bounces after him and then WHAM! It goes up w a tremendous shock. There is a SHIFT in the snow, a GROAN of shifting weight, then the ENTIRE CORNICE cracks loose and topples over the brink. Xander streaks down the mountain with that wall of snow a his heels. From down below it's an awesome sight. The slack-jawed Gu watch as tons of churning snow bear down on them. Shooting in and out of that powdery mass like a surfer, t can see Xander skipping like a stone down the mountain fa There's a mad scramble as Guards turn their snowmobiles a ride for their lives. A furious Viktor spins around and m a run for it as well. Nobody has a chance. The avalanche is coming like a freig train, frothing like white water. Xander blazes right through the scrambling Guards and hit JUMP. He goes soaring up and lands square on the sloped r of the Outpost. The avalanche is right behind him, slamming down everythi and everyone in its way. Guards are swallowed up and tossed, snowmobiles go tumbli under the onslaught. Xander grabs onto the chimney as the avalanche washes ove the Outpost. He holds on until the ocean of snow comes to stop. Then it's all quiet. Above him the slope is a battlefield of icy rubble. There nothing moving up there anymore. Xander pulls himself fre Then he hears a gushing sound and a DEEP BENEATH THE SURF he sees the WARM ORANGE GLOW OF FLAME. It's Viktor and hi flame thrower. There's another SPURT and the glow fades f good. Xander boards to a rock and sits to catch his breath. He' right above the Castle now. Then his communicator starts BEEP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into communicator) Gibbons, long time no talk. You  wouldn't believe my day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell has been going on,  Triple X? How about a status report?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander looks down on the Castle. There seem to be MAFIYA  HENCHMEN all over the grounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snow covered fortress. Army of bad  guys. The usual.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm on the way with a team to relieve  you. What's the latest?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They retrofitted Ahab with some kind  of rocket launcher. They were loading  canisters of liquid into it, light  colored and dark colored in the same  tube but separate. Something tells  me this it that "classified" stuff  you didn't want me to know about.  Does the song "Silent Night" mean  anything to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes it does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Gibbons, you can do better  then that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silent Night is the name of a top  secret binary nerve agent. The glass  canister is shot into the air and  detonated. The black and white  chemicals mix, forming a toxic cloud.  When it settles down to Earth, it'll  kill everything in the vicinity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ, Gibbons, this is  something we came up with?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, that's right. So now that you  know, you understand why it's  important that we get it back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kinda funny, though, isn't it? We're  not supposed to be making weapons  like that anyway. Guess we shoulda  played by the rules.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody else makes those decisions,  not guys like you and me. You've  done your job, X, head back to Prague.  I'll be landing in 90 minutes. This  is my operation now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't have that kinda time, boss,  I don't think Prague's gonna be around  much longer. I've gotta go now. I've  got a lot of bad guys to kill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander hangs up and heads down the hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GUARD patrols the rocky grounds outside the castle. He  stops for a smoke when Xander walks right up to him. WHACK! With two quick blows he knocks him out and keeps  walking. He's a man on a mission. He runs in a low crouch to the smooth castle wall. There' no hand-holds, it's, a perfectly flat climb. A canyon of  ROCKS is below. Xander reaches into his jacket and pulls out the "TERMINA CLIMBING CLAWS. He pulls on the metal gloves and CLAWS in the solid rock. Just like that he starts scaling the vertical surface. We see him outlined against the mountains, steadily makin this impossible climb. At the top is an overhang. It's a gnarly transition. As h rounding it, his FEET SLIP. His legs dangle over the rock chasm below. Using all his strength, he pulls himself up the rest of t way with his climbing claws. At the top a GUARD leans over, aiming his gun at him. Xan grabs him and pulls him over the edge. The Guard FALLS into the chasm. Xander rolls onto the parapet, exhausted. Then another GU rushes him, grabbing for his rifle. Xander springs, the claws lashing out, and tears the gun  from his hands. With the other hand he SLASHES, taking th Guard down. He pulls off the claws and heads into the Guard Tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander exits the Guard Tower at the ground level. As he crosses the courtyard an EXPLOSION rocks the tower just left. There is shouting as GUARDS race around the parapets, uns where the attack is coming from. A GUARD runs up to Xande

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Russian) What's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander CLOTHESLINES him and catches his AK-47 as he drops Up inside the castle he can see Yorgi at a window. Yorgi  appears mildly shocked as they make EYE CONTACT. Xander takes aim.

dialogues.speaker: XANDER THRU SNIPER SCOPE
dialogues.text: From up above, Kirill has Xander in his sights. BLAW! The bullet hits Xander's AK, sending it spinning. Xander rubs his sore hand but stays put. Kirill could hav killed him and he knows it. From a doorway comes Yorgi wi some Guards. Yorgi walks up and SMASHES Xander in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was for Anders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't forget goatee boy. I greased  him up on the diamond run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi punches him again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra sits at a desk working on a LAPTOP. Yorgi enters wi Xander and Kirill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look who we found playing outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra looks up. She can barely hide her shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra, my sweet dove, do you notice  anything strange about X? He looks  slightly less than dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill aims his gun at Petra.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi, I thought he was --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi SLAPS her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you think I didn't know about you  all along? My contacts in the KGB  told me you were coming. You show up  undercover and, I must admit, you  play your part to the hilt. When  it's time to be cruel, you are cruel.  When it's time to be passionate, you  are very very passionate indeed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra is devastated by this revelation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could have killed you, but I thought  this would be so much more fun. To  twist you and use you how I see fit.  And to be honest, you went much  farther than I ever expected you  would for your country.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs this fingers through her hair and moves on to Xan

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you. Why do you have such a  problem staying away, my friend? Did  you miss us that much?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanted to get the hell out of Prague  before Silent Night falls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not bad, man, not bad. You put things  together quick. Prague it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Peace conference...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice place to start, don't you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the gimmick, Yorgi? That's  the part I don't get. You gonna hold  the world hostage with your gas bombs?  I didn't think you were dumb enough  to go with that hack cliche.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think I'm after money? I told  you, my friend. Anarchy. Time for a  change. Money is good, but for true  freedom you have to get rid of the  rules themselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So all by yourself, you're going to  destroy every government; in the  world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easier than that, buddy. I'll get  them to destroy each other. You kill  an entire Peace conference, someone  is going to have to pay. Then our  friend Ahab continues down the river  to the ocean and begins his world  tour. London, Cairo, Beijing... Pretty  soon everyone's involved. These guys  bomb those guys, those guys invade  these guys. Soon the whole world is  like your wild West cowboy days. No  rules, no law, everybody free to do  what they want.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Including rape, pillage, murder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, if that's what you want. Why  not? It's all human nature. So we  just have to launch our baby and  wait for the decline and fall of  civilization as we know it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And here I thought "anarchy" was  just something cool to put on a  Tshirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Xander. You used to stand  for something. What happened to you,  man? I thought you'd get it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you see, X? For the betterment  of humanity, he's going to start  World War Three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a regular humanitarian. And all  this time I thought he was just a  tool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You both could have been a part of  it. You could have ridden with us  into a new day, the dawning of a new  age of --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh just shoot us already. I'm sorry  I asked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi's eye twitches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Screw you too, buddy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He raises his gun and suddenly BOOOOOM! A massive explosi rocks the whole castle. Shrapnel shatters the windows,  spraying glass, and Yorgi's shot goes wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front gates have just been blown apart. Through the s and wreckage come Ivans 1 & 2 with a PLATOON OF CRACK SECRET POLICE. Their submachine guns rattle in threeshot  bursts, sweeping Guards from the parapets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill looks down at the carnage below. Xander takes adva of the distraction and charges at Yorgi. Yorgi goes to shoot but his hand won't work. There's a HU SHARD OF GLASS sticking through his forearm. By the time he pulls it out, Xander is on top of him. He  body checks Yorgi, sending him flying over a desk. Kirill spins and starts FIRING. Xander ducks for cover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Czech Secret Police are having their way. They cross courtyard and burst into the main building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Police whip through the building like lightening, mow down everyone in their path. One Czech Secret Policeman is wounded and the others reta with a volley of RPG's that evaporates a pocket of resist In the main room upstairs, Kirill is blasting away. Yorgi starts rounding up the computer gear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry up, kill him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Kirill can do so, Cops burst into the room, sprayi bullets everywhere. Xander and Petra are pinned down, but Yorgi and Kirill ma to make a fast exit out another door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! We're on your side!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cops keep shooting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ivan 1 is talking on the radio when Yorgi appears behind and shoots him in the back. They step over him and enter a GARAGE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ahab device is in the back of a flatbed TRUCK. Yorgi Kirill start up the truck and jam it into gear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck smashes through the garage doors and rumbles ac the courtyard. Police open fire, but the truck tears out the gate and st heading down the mountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Xander and Petra are still pinned down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra! Tell them something!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra starts calling out in RUSSIAN. Finally the cops sto shooting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander and Petra are brought outside. They see the Police working on the wounded Ivan 1. Ivan 2 walks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's Ivan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for coming, man, you guys  were right on time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are always on time. Two have  escaped, in truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi and Kirill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me guess, they had a big white  torpedo with them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Your friend, the angry one, he  send something for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A big truck pulls to a stop. Its ramp lowers and Xander's blown-out '72 GTO comes rolling out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll be right behind you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander and Petra both strap on grenades and pistols.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you do your homework?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nods) If they launch it, I know how to  bring it back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both climb in and the GTO peels out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander drives all out, trying hard to catch up. He passes several of Ivan's Police Jeeps at a furious cli Up ahead they see the truck winding it's way down the  mountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's he headed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He owns a big industrial complex on  the river. He'll launch it from there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander floors it. Up ahead, in the flatbed truck, Yorgi drives. He can see GTO gaining on them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Russian, subtitled) They're coming! Get back there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill loads his sniper rifle and climbs out of the cab. lays down, resting the rifle on the Ahab container. As the GTO comes into view, he sights up and FIRES, WHACK The first shot goes clean through the windshield and blow the headrest off Xander's seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You get down! I'll take care of this  fool!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls out an Mp-5 out and hangs it out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Don't shoot! He's hiding behind  the nerve agent!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another shot blasts through, taking off the rear-view mir

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamit! He's gonna stop playing  around soon and shoot something  valuable!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill laughs and takes aim once again. He puts Petra in sights.
