Xander jerks the steering wheel and BLAM! the shot goes w The GTO veers onto a dirt road that cuts down the mountai Xander fights for control as they slide around the turns. The road flattens out and they can see the Industrial Com up ahead. They cut across a field, heading right for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck heads through the gates of the industrial compl Quickly the gates are closed again. Armed GUARDS can be s up above. The GTO comes at the gates at full speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see what my man put together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander opens a DASH PANEL, revealing a ROW OF SWITCHES. H flips one. The HEADLIGHTS EJECT, revealing a MINI-GUN IN EACH FENDER BRRRAAAAAAPPP!! The mini-guns spin. The metal doors are getting SHREDDED. Empty SHELLS spill down the sides of the GTO. The metal doors come apart, falling in chunks. The GTO slams through the wreckage without slowing down. A Guard comes tumbling down and BOUNCES off the trunk as GTO zips inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Anarchy 99 guys seem to have a whole other army in he Guards spill onto the road, shooting at them from everywh A BELLY PANEL on the GTO opens and ping-pong ball sized  MINIBOMBS dump onto the road. BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! The bombs send the Guards scattering. The GTO sizzles away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd the damn truck go?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go to the water, it's that way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tactical (a pick-up with a .50 cal machine gun attached pulls up behind them and opens fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toadies right behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra punches another button. The REAR HUBCAPS pop off. They roll along the road on the own. Inside they seem to be LINED WITH SPIKES. As the Tactical pulls up in between the hubcaps they BLOW UP, SPRAYING SPIKES at both sides of the Tactical. All four wheels BLOW OUT and the Tactical goes out of con It crashes through a fence and pitches into the water, th men going sprawling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fantastic options.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the riverbank Yorgi and Kirill pull Ahab off the truck and prepare for launching. They remove it from it's box and carry it waist deep into the water. Yorgi opens a panel and works feverishly on Ah insides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got it, go! Cover me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill grabs his sniper rifle and heads off. He climbs up to a second story window of a wooden buildin on a WHARF. From here he can shoot and NOT BE SEEN. He ta his LIT CIGARETTE and tucks it behind his ear. When the GTO rounds the corner he FIRES. The bullet goes through the window and SLAMS into the ste column. Xander jams it into reverse. They retreat behind a buildi Petra clutches her arm, wounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A piece of shrapnel hit me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sick of that guy. Let's stop  playing nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirill chambers another bullet and waits for them to make their second approach. The GTO comes roaring out, spinnin in circles wildly. Xander's is just doing donuts as fast he can. Kirill aims, but with all the dust being kicked up he doe have much of a target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He doesn't notice Petra pop up from behind a fence with a HEAT SEEKING MISSILE LAUNCHER. ANGLE ON - the missile launcher's COMPUTER SCREEN. The gr display shows a faint red glow in the upstairs window. It the GLOWING POINT of Kirill's lit cigarette. The Launcher BEEPS as it locks in and she FIRES. Kirill looks up to see the missile blazing down the wharf him. He gets it immediately. In a panic he fumbles for the  cigarette... Too late. The missile zeroes in on his head. WHOOOSH! The entire wooden shack blows apart. Xander walks up to Petra.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess the surgeon general was right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON - Ahab as Yorgi flips a switch and let's it go. electric motor purrs to life and Ahab zips out into the r Xander and Petra run to the water's edge in time to see Y escaping in a MOTORBOAT. In the opposite direction they s the ripples of Ahab as it speeds towards it's destination Petra finds the CONTROLLER in the cab of the truck. She  presses buttons desperately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's shut out the communication  circuit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't talk to it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's like a safety. We are going  to have to access the manual controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A manual control on a moving torpedo.  This day keeps getting better and  better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander starts running towards a second moored MOTORBOAT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Radio Ivan! Tell him what's going  down! Have them evacuate downtown!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yorgi is motoring away, smiling, when he glances back and sees Xander and Petra take off after Ahab. He pounds on h steering wheel and turns around. His bigger boat closes o them and he reloads his weapons. Xander drives while Petra checks her controller.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's running three meters down. Twenty  knots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It has to surface to release the  nerve agent, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By then it's too late! The only way  to safely dispose of the nerve agent  is in deep water! The chemicals will  break down and dissipate!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use your grenades! Maybe we can blow  it up underwater!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're heading into downtown Prague now, the riverbank  getting more and more populated. Yorgi is closing fast. Down below them Petra can see the white streak of Ahab be the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There it is! Hold it steady!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra pulls the pin on a grenade. She tosses it out in fr of Ahab. WHOOMPH! A jet of water goes up, but too far beh She pulls another pin and is ready to throw when Yorgi's  boat pulls up alongside. Yorgi aims and FIRES and the bul GRAZES Petra's arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Petra!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She loses her grip and the grenade bounces down into the  engine compartment. Xander grabs Petra and jumps. Together they land in Yorgi boat. The grenade explodes and their boat slams into a br support and shatters. They are in the heart of the old city now. We see piazza' full of tourists, markets packed with locals, children pl in front of cathedrals. And on the river Yorgi and Xander battle it out while Petra steers the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander! It's coming up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander glances down, sees Ahab nearing the surface. Yorgi clobbers him and Xander falls to the edge of the boat. Pe tries to help, but Yorgi slugs her in her wounded arm. Xander can see Ahab just a few inches under as Yorgi grab him from behind in a chokehold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is going to be exciting, buddy!  Front row seats to the apocalypse!  Come on, sing with me! (singing madly) "I am an Antichrist / I am an  anarchist / I... wan-na be...  Anarchy!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander elbow's Yorgi's gut and breaks the chokehold. He f him and they both topple overboard. They land on Ahab and both grab on. They punch and pummel each other while desperately hanging on to the speeding  torpedo. It surfaces as it approaches the magnificent St. Charles bridge. On the bridge is a chaos of COPS, FIREMEN and CROWDS OF  PEOPLE. They are desperately trying to herd people away f the river. Xander pounds Yorgi's face and dunks him underwater. Yorg slips and falls back to the tail section, dragging along the torpedo's wake. Ahab starts making noise and it's payload doors swing ope Inside Xander can see the row of glass cannister containi Silent Night. The first one rises up into FIRING POSITION

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No you don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pries the first rocket off it's launcher. The thing is BEEPING menacingly. IN SLO-MOTION - Xander blinks at the liquid death in his  hands. He looks over at Petra. She's shouting at him, but doesn't hear a thing but his own HEARTBEAT. He looks the other direction, to the mass of PEOPLE on th bridge above him. Total strangers... The fate of the whole world is in the hands of a former  nihilist. Through the crowd, Xander sees Gibbons break through with his squad of Agents. Gibbons and Xander make eye contact. Then Yorgi lunges onto his back, trying to pull him into water. Xander HITS BUTTONS on the control panel and Ahab  starts to DIVE.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: With Yorgi hanging on his back, Xander turns the rocket u down and stuffs it BACK IN THE LAUNCHER. Ahab heads down to the bottom of the river, the two men  fighting. We see one man get THROWN FREE, the other is caught up on Ahab and continues downstream. Then the booster rocket FIRES, giving off SPARKS and BUBB It's all in silhouette now as WHAM! The rocket EXPLODES,  setting off a CHAIN REACTION. WHAM! WHAM! WHAM! Ahab and  it's unfortunate passenger are DISINTEGRATED by the BLAST The chemicals BELCH OUT in harmless clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FUNNEL OF WATER blasts into the sky. The crowd recoils.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ivan 2 helps Petra off the motorboat. They look down at t water, but there's no sign of Xander. Gibbons and his men push through the cordon of POLICE,  scanning the water. Nothing. Tears well in Petra's eyes. Even Gibbons looks dejected. Then Petra let's out a gasp and they look downstream. There's a boat ramp leading into the water. At first they see a ripple, then the top of a SHAVED HEAD emerges. The whole crowd looks on as Xander rises from the water,  walking up the boat ramp. His shirt is tattered, his tattooed body battered. But th a look on his face, a calm, a self-confidence we haven't  seen before. The Phoenix has risen. Petra runs down to him and throws her arms around him. Xa shakes Ivan 2's hand and then turns to Gibbons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thought you bought the farm down  there, X. Glad as hell to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm pretty happy to see me too. So  are you done with me yet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've kept up your end of the  bargain, I'll do the same. But you  really should consider staying on,  you make a decent agent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I hate cops, remember? Except  for her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut the crap, X, I saw you down there.  You're a hero. Don't be afraid to  join the good guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who says you're the good guys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He starts walking off with Petra.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what they say, the only way  to change the system is from the  inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah? Why don't we start by taking  this thing off my ankle? The poison  needles?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On come on, X. Did you really think  we were that barbaric?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No needles, huh? What about the acid  bath?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All for show. Just a psychological  mind game to get you to do the right  thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) You're a jerk-off, you know that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibbons waves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll be talking soon, you'll see.  You'll be back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xander and Petra move off through the crowd arm in arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe my mission is finally  over. I don't even know what to do  with myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't welch on me now. We had a  deal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON - a big "X" spelled out in SEASHELLS on the sand The camera shoots up into the sky, showing a perfect whit beach, a perfect lagoon, a lush green island... BORA BORA Then we hear the BUZZING of a TATTOO NEEDLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His ink done, Xander walks out onto the back deck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Craggy mountain peaks and perfect turquoise blue water. Xander steps out of a hut built over the water. We see Petra sprawled out on the deck in a bikini. She's a bucket of HINANO BEER chilling down. It's a vision of  heaven. He lays down next to her, starts pulling her bikini botto off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughing) What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's about your next mission. You  need to be debriefed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FROM UNDERWATER - we see the two of them dive into the la nude. There's too many bubbles to see any real skin, but know what they're up to. Back on the surface we see BUBBLES rising and catch glimp of their outlines beneath the water. The Camera pulls back to the deck, where we see Xander's  COMMUNICATOR on the table next to the beers. We hear them surface and start SPLASHING off camera. Then the damn communicator starts to BEEP. FADE OUT.
